Strong ethics Analytical approach to problems Being able to read and summarize research papers in Machine Learning and apply them Leadership and a make-do, problem solving attitude Original thinking Presentation skills Research publications, patents, public projects are a plus

title: Process engineers Up Stream and Downstream Processing
summary:
You have affinity with data management, analysis and modelling.
Data-analysis (data management, analysis and modelling).
The further process will be:
description: Description Janssen Vaccines & Prevention, one of the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies of Johnson & Johnson, is dedicated to bringing meaningful innovation to global health. Our teams focus on the discovery, development, manufacture, and marketing of vaccines to protect people worldwide from infectious diseases. These range from respiratory infections like respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) to human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) and pathogens of global concern such as Ebola and COVID-19. In our organization, entrepreneurial people work in a dynamic culture in which innovation and a 'can do' state of mind are the central points. In order to strengthen our team, we are continuously looking for enthusiastic, talented people who have the ambition to develop themselves and can be of value to Janssen. Scientist Academy As a contractor, you work together with other process engineers and scientists. You will follow diverse soft skill training and you will have monthly individual coach sessions with an experienced career coach. This is called the Scientist Academy of Procam, one of the partners of Janssen. Procam will also conduct a part of this recruitment process (see below: Recruitment process) and If you get accepted by our hiring managers, you will be offered to be employed by Procam for the duration of the Scientist Academy.   USP and DSP departments The ‘Up Stream Processing’ (USP) department and ‘Down Stream Processing’ (DSP) department are part of the Drug Substance Development group, located in Leiden and are responsible for early- as well as late-stage development of scalable, pharmaceutical-grade production processes for viral vaccines. The developed production processes are transferred into production facilities for the production of clinical batches and scaled-up and transferred for commercial production. This is done in close collaboration with many partners in Discovery, Development and Supply Chain in an international environment. USP develops and characterizes bioreactor production processes for adenovirus vectored vaccines with mammalian cell lines as a production platform. DSP develops and characterizes processes for purifying USP harvest into Drug Substance. Within both departments, the current focus is on developing a robust process for the manufacturing of the COVID-19 vaccine and transferring the technology to multiple production facilities, including process validation and technical support. In order to support these activities, we are looking for multiple process engineers. Job description We are looking for motivated process engineers who can ensure a smooth technology transfer from development into the commercial GMP facilities. In addition, hands-on support for troubleshooting, optimization, process monitoring, modeling and data collection, management, and analysis are key components of the function.  You will represent USP or DSP in the multidisciplinary project team(s), being responsible for process engineering in that project, in close connection to all relevant stakeholders. In order to design or improve the process, you translate the development of production goals into actions and accomplish the targets by delivering study designs and study plans, analyze data, write technical reports, and implement the recommendations in close connection with the customer.  Qualifications  Qualifications You have a PhD or PDeng in a relevant discipline in biopharmaceutical engineering, biotechnology or chemistry or M.Sc. with relevant years of hand-on process engineering experience. You have affinity with data management, analysis and modelling. USP: you have affinity with bioreactor process technology/large scale production processes. DSP: you have experience with downstream process development with hands-on experience with unit operations like IEX chromatography and UF/DF. scale-up/scale-down of DSP processes. Competencies Enthusiasm to support production by hands-on presence during production Pragmatic Demonstrated communication capabilities and the ability to bridge between production and development Data-analysis (data management, analysis and modelling)  Recruitment process Recruitment and selection for this Janssen position is partly outsourced to Procam. You can apply for this specific position in combination with the training program, for which a resume and motivation letter are required. If you have a preference, please describe for which department. The further process will be:  Screening of resume and motivation letter. If additional information is needed a short interview by phone may be required. Assessment day by Procam (online Teams meeting), consisting of capability tests, a personality questionnaire, an interview with a Procam assessment psychologist, and an interview with a Career coach. As a result of this assessment day, a personal profile will be drawn up. Online interview(s) with Janssen managers.  Primary Location Netherlands-South Holland-Leiden- Organization Janssen Vaccines & Prevention BV (8852) Job Function Engineering Requisition ID 2105900095W

title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
summary:
Work with data scientists and tech to build unit, integration, and model validation tests in place.
Identify, design, and implement strategy for data scientists…
description: Jouw nieuwe baan en werkplek Do you want to make big impact, work for over 10 international brands within Ahold Delhaize (e.g. Albert Heijn, Bol.com. Delhaize, Stop & Shop and Food Lion) and work within our newly formed European Data Science & Analytics team? Then we are looking for you.  As Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Ahold Delhaize, you are our expert within this domain. You will work closely together with our data science and analytics teams from our brands (Albert Heijn, Delhaize, Etos etc.) and the regional US team. We seek mutual opportunities, work together on implementing state-of-the-art data solutions and help them taking data science and analytics to a higher level. You are an expert in identifying, implementing and improving data solutions driving sustainable value for our customers and businesses. You participate in the cross functional scrum teams with the lead brands and you have a strong vision on data solutions. As Senior Machine Learning Engineer you will create impact at scale, as we want to scale and leverage these solutions across the brands.  In this role you are a thoughtleader on Data engineering and Data Quality. You ensure agreed timelines are being delivered and you will develop governs and develops policy. You will join the scrum team to accelerate the development and productionizing of algorithms and make sure they are scalable and portable to other teams. You ensure code is modularized, reusable, tested, and properly versioned. Therefore you are responsible for overall quality of ML pipeline and production models.  In order to do this right, you liase between the ML teams and share learnings and code between brands. As you are the ML expert you keep abreast of developments in the field and promote relevant learnings within our organization. This way you will improve numerous processes and the experiences of millions of customers every single day.  As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Ahold Delhaize will: Develop machine learning applications according to requirements. Support in identifying data requirements at scale. Act as ML expert, sharing knowledge between brands and helping to promote best practices. Document data processing flow for renewal and productionizing Work with data scientists and tech to build unit, integration, and model validation tests in place. Identify, design, and implement strategy for data scientists across our organization to share code and environments. Mentor the team and our organization on development on Machine Learning.  Your new office As our Senior Machine Learning Engineer you will work at and across Ahold Delhaize where approximately 370,000 employees worldwide serve over 50 million customers a week. Locally, you’ll be working with 1,500 colleagues in Zaandam, the Netherlands. We improve and innovate every day, supporting our trusted local brands and reinforcing our role as a leader in retail and e-commerce.  Everything you do with your colleagues is directly visible in our internal departments. You will be joining the newly formed Data Science & Analytics team. In this team we deliver scalable data products and building bridges between the different data science & analytics teams from our brands. Themes we are working on are relevance, personalization, forecasting, eCommerce and self-service analytics  Covid-19 Our main priority continues to be the health and safety of our employees and customers. Due to the Covid-19 pandemic, this position will be remote until further notice. We will continue monitor the circumstances and when we feel comfortable, this position will return to our Headquarters in Zaandam, where you will have the opportunity to collaborate face-to-face with a talented and diverse group of colleagues. This also means that all job interviews for this position will take place via video calls. Dit bieden we jou At Ahold Delhaize we want to grow. That is only possible if you grow with us. That is why you get access to best in class guidance and inspiring training, to shape your own development and career. As we work together to build on our brand as well as your career, you can count on (based on 40 hours per week): A gross yearly salary up to € 90K + 8% vacation pay, so you can enjoy a well-deserved rest. a bonus on top of your salary. a very good pension plan with a personal contribution of 6.2%. 20 vacation days. A budget choice which you can decide whether you spend it on extra days (+12,5 days), discounts or pay-outs. the possibility to attend training courses at our expense.? attractive discounts on various insurance policies. a laptop and telephone. 10% discount on your grocery shopping in our Albert Heijn stores, up to € 300 per year. flexible working hours and the possibility to work from home. a travel allowance for traveling to and from Zaandam, when we return to office. A new role in a new team, where you can add a lot of value. Dit breng je mee At Ahold Delhaize you’ll be working for one of the biggest retailers in the world. You are bursting with ambition to keep up with us. You supplement this ambition with:? Master Computer Science, Data Science or other relevant studies. If no relevant study, demonstrably relevant experience and interest. 7+ years of experience as a Data Engineer, Scientist or ML Engineer (ideally focused on working with production team aspect of roles). Advanced Experience in Python or another programming language and cloud platform knowledge, preferably Microsoft Azure. Experience with open-source technologies like Spark, AirFlow and Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc. Experience in MLDevOps tools including Git, Docker, CI/CD pipelines and REST API’s. You are familiar with formats like parquet and delta, experience with streaming data is a plus. You have seen notebooks that transfer DataFrames to JSON to loop data only to then transfer back to the DataFrame and maintained your cool while improving the code runtime. You are a thought leader on data engineering and quality, a self-starter who wants to make impact.  Apply now Do you want to play an active role in changing the food retail landscape as we know it? Then hop in and join us on our expedition. Apply now via the button on this page. In addition, we would like to ask you not to send a standard motivation letter, but to formulate an answer to the following questions: Why would you like to work for Ahold Delhaize? Why do you think you will be successful in this position and what kind of technical skills do you bring with you for this role? What is one of your personal strengths and one skill you wish to improve or develop?  Want to learn more first, before you apply? Wouter Lipsius, Talent Acquisition Partner, is happy to tell you everything about this vacancy via wouter.lipsius@aholddelhaize.com  WO Senior Data-science NLD-Zaandam, Provincialeweg 11 Je gaat werken bij

title: Consultant Data Scientist
summary: Cmotions is als adviesbureau gespecialiseerd in het toepassen van advanced analytics en data science op marketing en business vraagstukken van onze…
description: Organisatie Cmotions is als adviesbureau gespecialiseerd in het toepassen van advanced analytics en data science op marketing en business vraagstukken van onze opdrachtgevers. Wij ontwikkelen data gedreven business strategie\u00ebn voor onze opdrachtgevers, maar ook ondersteunen wij hen bij het realiseren of verder optimaliseren van een bestaande strategie. Bij ons werken zo\u2019n 60 gedreven consultants aan diverse hoogwaardige projecten met en bij onze opdrachtgevers, vaak in teamverband met andere Cmotions collega\u2019s. Enkele voorbeelden: - Ontwikkelen van een \u2018next best action model\u2019 voor een verzekeraar - Het optimaliseren van de omni channel marktbewerking o.b.v. in- en uitstroom analyses voor een telecom organisatie - Meer omzet realiseren door betere afstemming tussen online en offline verkopen bij een retailer Kijk ook op onze website voor meer voorbeelden, bijvoorbeeld bij de overheid en in de gezondheidszorg.  Functie-eisen Je bent afgestudeerd in marketing intelligence, artificial intelligence, computer science, econometrie, wiskunde, economische psychologie of een andere studie met een specialisatie in statistische methoden en technieken; Je beheerst \u00e9\u00e9n of meerdere van de volgende tools: SQL, R, Python, SAS, KNIME, SPSS; Analytisch en communicatief ben je sterk of je bent gedreven je hierop te ontwikkelen, daarnaast ben je nieuwsgierig, leergierig en ambitieus; Je hebt passie voor het vakgebied en wil je hierin verder ontwikkelen; Je bent prettig in de samenwerking, werkt graag in teamverband maar kunt zelfstandig ook goed tot je recht komen. Aanbod Werken bij Cmotions betekent Begeleiding en ontwikkeling Wij hechten veel waarde aan persoonlijke aandacht en begeleiding. Naast praktische werkwijzers die je helpen bij het structureren en monitoren van je opdrachten, bieden wij een vaste mentor en trainingen aan zodat je je vakinhoudelijk en op het gebied van adviesvaardigheden verder kunt ontplooien.  Uitdagend carri\u00e8reperspectief Werken bij Cmotions betekent dat je voor uiteenlopende opdrachtgevers, top 500 bedrijven zowel profit als non-profit, werkzaamheden zult uitvoeren. Hierbij houden wij rekening met type opdrachtgever, type opdracht, locatie van de opdracht en jouw persoonlijke voorkeuren en situatie.  Arbeidsvoorwaarden Goede en marktconforme arbeidsvoorwaarden beschouwen wij als een basis hygi\u00ebne van een werkgever. Een goede work/life balans vinden wij erg belangrijk. Zo maken we een sabbatical leave mogelijk en zijn we voorstander van flexibel werken. Wat wij bovenal bieden is een omgeving waarin je kunt leren en ontwikkelen, met het maken van fouten dat daarbij hoort. Je hebt de vrijheid om naar eigen inzicht te werken en je kunt beroep doen op al je andere collega\u2019s voor de nodige ondersteuning of reflectie. Inlichtingen Wil je ons team komen versterken en uitdagende projecten uitvoeren? Dan ontvangen wij graag jouw CV! Voor meer informatie of vragen kunnen je contact opnemen met Recruitment (Elmira of Aline) via 033 743 00 00 of recruitment@cmotions.nl.

title: Scientist Clinical Immunology
summary:
Affinity for data analysis and the thorough review of the data generated by others.
Are you a scientist within the field of clinical immunology?
description: Scientist Clinical Immunology Location: Leiden Contact: Nicol Heijtbrink Job type: Temp to Perm Contact phone: +31 (0)20 406 97 50 Industry: Pharmaceutical , Life Sciences, Biotechnology Contact email: nicol_heijtbrink@oxfordcorp.com Are you a scientist within the field of clinical immunology? Are you looking to make that next step in your career at a large pharmaceutical company? Please read on! Job description In the clinical immunology department important immunological evaluations of vaccine candidates take place. The data gathered from the different assays is used in clinical trials, therefor this department plays a crucial role in the progress of the clinical trial. Examples of immunological assays that are performed are: ELISA, T cell ELISpot, cytokine staining (intracellular) and virus neutralization assays (VNA). The main responsibility of the Scientist clinical immunology is to design and execute experiments for the development and validation of immunological assays to be used in the analysis of samples from clinical trials, and to generate high-quality scientific reports to document this work Responsibilities Responsible for the development to validation of serology or cell-based assays (ELISA, Virus Neutralization Assays, ELISPOT, Flow Cytometry) according to regulatory standards such as ICH. Instruct operators on the scientific fundamentals of the assays being performed and review the data they generate. Proven knowledge of procedures to establish comparability and bridging of critical reagents Experience with using the "Design of Experiment (DoE)" principles is a plus Knowledge of biostatistics. Experience in statistical programs such SPSS or JMP is a must Affinity for data analysis and the thorough review of the data generated by others. Experience in high-throughput assays is desirable Excellent communication skills, fluent in English. Experienced in working under quality standards such as GCLP, GCP or GMP. Requirements At least in possession of a PhD in the field of immunology or similar with 3+ years of experience in pharmaceutical or biotech setting; You have a creative and innovative mind; A team player with soft skills, able to motivate and empower others. Good planning and coordinating skills. You are an excellent communicator and familiar with client contact; English is a must, A valid work permit for the Netherlands is a must Benefits Contract: 1 year contract via Oxford Global Resources with a possible extension Salary: €4200 - €5000 based on education / experience; Region: Leiden Hours: Full-time, dayshift; Vacancy number: 16820 Oxford Global Resources is het grootste recruitmentbureau binnen de vakgebieden Science, Engineering en IT. Al onze recruiters hebben zelf een relevante achtergrond binnen deze gebieden en helpen je graag bij het vinden van de perfecte baan in ons uitgebreide netwerk. Als gespecialiseerde partij hebben wij een groot aanbod aan laboratorium vacatures op het gebied van Quality Control (QC) en Research &Development (R&D) binnen diverse sectoren, waaronder de Farmaceutische industrie, Biotechnologie, Contract Manufacturing, Contract Research, Voedingsmiddelenindustrie, Chemie, Milieu en Plantensector. Oxford is altijd op zoek naar talent met expertise op het gebied van Biotechnologie, Immunologie, Biochemie, Virologie, Microbiologie, Moleculaire Biologie, Life Science, Analytische Chemie, Fysische Chemie, Polymeerchemie, Petrochemie en Diagnostiek. Wij komen graag in contact met kandidaten die ervaring hebben met een of meerdere van de volgende technieken: USP (Upstream Processing) DSP (Downstream Processing), Bioprocesses, viruskweek, celkweek, ELISA, FACS, Western Blot, SDS-page, PCR, RT-PCR, qPCR, kloneren, sequencing, eiwit zuivering, purificatie, HPLC, UPLC, chromatografie, fysische chemie, viscositeit, smeltpunt, pourpoint, pH, XRF, GC, GC-MS, LC, LC-MS, ICP ICP-MS, AAS, UV, titraties, Karl Fisher, formuleren, steriliteit, determinaties, bioburden, environmental monitoring, LIMS, GMP, GLP, GCP, GDP, ISO17025. Vind je deze vacature interessant? Of ben jij op zoek naar een functie op MLO, HLO, BSc, WO, MSc of PhD en heb je interesse in de vacature laboratorium Assistent, Laborant, Laborant monstervoorbereiding, Analist, Technician, Assistant Scientist, Associate Scientist, Scientist, Manufacturing Specialist, Process Engineer, Validatie Engineer, QA (Quality Assurance) Officer, RA (Regulatory Affairs) Officer, Supervisor, Teamleider, Afdelingshoofd, Hoofd Laboratorium, Manager, Director, etc. Neem dan direct contact met ons op!
