Je hebt kennis en of affiniteit met Ecodesign en RoHS en bent in staat om vanuit de inhoud economische trends te vertalen in risico analyses in relatie tot de productieketen. Je hebt aantoonbare werkervaring in multidisciplinaire teams in b.v. een project organisatie waarbij het schakelen met diverse stakeholders een onderdeel is. Je hebt kennis van ( elektronische & elektrische ) productwetgeving en ontwikkeling en beschikt over een netwerk in dit speelveld. Je hebt affiniteit en of ervaring met juridische processen: je begrijpt hoe deze werken en stemt je eigen werkzaamheden daarop af. Je kunt je mondeling en schriftelijk goed uitdrukken in de Nederlandse taal.. Je kunt goed samenwerken met verschillende disciplines op uitvoerings- en tactisch niveau, en bent flexibel om voor andere productgroepen binnen de ILT te worden ingezet. Je krijgt de kans om zelf een specialisme te ontwikkelen van waaruit je andere collega’s kan begeleien in de toekomst. Je bent organisatiesenstief , in staat om 'out of the box ‘ te denken , je hebt een helicopterview en je bent een natuurlijke netwerker en verbinder. Arbeidsvoorwaarden Salarisniveau schaal 11 Maandsalaris Min €3.279 – Max. €5.039 (bruto) Dienstverband Arbeidsovereenkomst voor bepaalde tijd met uitzicht op onbepaalde tijd Contractduur Tijdelijke aanstelling / Arbeidsovereenkomst voor bepaalde tijd met uitzicht op onbepaalde tijd Maximaal aantal uren per week 36 Overige arbeidsvoorwaarden Naast het salaris ontvang je een Individueel Keuzebudget (IKB). Het IKB bestaat uit geld (16,37% van je bruto jaarsalaris) en tijd. Met het IKB maak jij de keuzes die bij jou passen en kun je een deel van je arbeidsvoorwaarden zelf samenstellen. Je kunt er bijvoorbeeld voor kiezen om een deel van je maandinkomen te laten uitbetalen wanneer jij dat wenst. Ook kun je dit budget omzetten in verlof en andersom of besteden aan fiscaal vriendelijke doelen. De Rijksoverheid hecht sterk aan persoonlijke groei en loopbaanontwikkeling en biedt daarvoor tal van mogelijkheden. Tot de secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden behoren onder meer verschillende studiefaciliteiten, bedrijfsfitness, volledige vergoeding van je OV-reiskosten woon-werkverkeer en gedeeltelijk betaald ouderschapsverlof. Bijzonderheden De sluitingsdatum voor deze vacature is tot 26 maart 2021 Houd er rekening mee dat wij de vacature eerder kunnen sluiten als er meer dan voldoende reacties binnen gekomen zijn. Afhankelijk van de corona maatregelen vinden de eerste gesprekken plaats via een online tool of face-to-face Het inwinnen van referenties maakt deel uit van het sollicitatieproces. Een (online) voorselectietest, een assessment en het maken van een casus en (online) screening via onder meer databanken kunnen deel uitmaken van het sollicitatieproces. Acquisitie op onze vacatures wordt niet in behandeling genomen. Meer over de functiegroep Inspecteur / Medewerker Toezicht Door het Functiegebouw Rijk worden medewerkers en leidinggevenden geholpen bij het maken van resultaat- en ontwikkelafspraken in functioneringsgesprekken en krijgt men inzicht in de loopbaanmogelijkheden binnen de Rijksoverheid. Meer informatie op Functiegebouw Rijksoverheid Inspectie Leefomgeving en Transport De Inspectie Leefomgeving en Transport (ILT) ziet erop toe dat zeer uiteenlopende doelgroepen een breed scala van wetten en regels naleven. We werken aan een duurzame en veilige leefomgeving, aan veilig transport en aan het vertrouwen in de woningcorporaties. We bewegen mee met maatschappelijke en technologische ontwikkelingen en zetten onze middelen in daar waar de risico’s voor de publieke belangen het grootst zijn. Een goed gebruik van data en andere informatie is sturend voor al onze werkzaamheden: van toezicht en vergunning- en dienstverlening tot opsporing en communicatie. Samenwerken, leren door doen en constant verbeteren zijn onze sleutelwoorden. Medewerkers, leidinggevenden en teams krijgen de ruimte om talenten optimaal in te zetten, bevlogenheid te tonen en het verschil te maken. Welke eigenschappen wij zoeken in nieuwe medewerkers? De vaardigheid om te kunnen werken met diverse informatiebronnen, out-of-the-box kunnen denken bij toezichtsvraagstukken, de creativiteit hebben om vernieuwende methodes te bedenken en in te zetten, met lef onbekende paden durven bewandelen en overzicht kunnen houden.

title: Lead Product Designer
summary: GeoPhy’s multidisciplinary teams consist of data scientists, engineers, statisticians and economists, using data science and supervised machine learning to…
description: GeoPhy is a technology company in the real estate space. We provide property valuations engineered for the modern world, giving property lenders and investors fast, consistent and reliable access to information. Our technology allows our customers to understand value and its drivers by using both traditional and unconventional sources, using machine learning to create the most accurate valuations in the market. GeoPhy’s multidisciplinary teams consist of data scientists, engineers, statisticians and economists, using data science and supervised machine learning to optimize the unprecedented volume and variety of data now available in the real estate sector. As the Lead Product Designer on our Evra product line, you will play an important role in driving product success in close partnership with our users, business stakeholders and product management. This role will enable you in identifying and executing on opportunities to better meet user needs, as well as to extend the product offering with new and innovative ideas. In this role, you will work on the discovery and definition of user needs, the conception of product solutions, and responsible for delivering intuitive designs that enable the world’s largest CRE investors and lenders to make better informed decisions, faster. As an early addition to our design community, this role is foundational in defining and expanding the design culture at GeoPhy. You will be responsible for leading the charge on UX standards of best research and design practices as well as demonstrating the value of design in accruing user and business value. We are passionate about investing in our people and providing a clear growth path and opportunities that allows you to flex all your UX and design muscles. What you’ll be responsible for Own the user experience end to end for Evra, as the product’s lead designer. You will be responsible for undertaking holistic user journey analysis and improvement. Undertake user research planning, documentation and synthesis to enable product discovery, in close collaboration with Product Management. Execute rapid wireframing and prototyping to refine ideas into tangible product features that satisfy user needs. Enable product delivery through development of design requirements and any necessary visual artefacts. Drive the definition of our design culture, as one of Evra’s early design hires, and create/manage GeoPhy’s design system for use by multiple product functions. What we’re looking for You bring a minimum of 3 years working experience as a Product Designer or similar role with an impressive UX portfolio. You demonstrate strong UX, interaction, and UI design skills, and use a range of tools, including wireframing and prototyping to communicate your vision. You are passionate about using data to drive your decision-making and you have experience designing software products powered by data analytics and data science. You combine an empathetic mindset with UX research practices to help unearth meaningful insights that drive product success. You promote a positive design culture by setting up design critiques and feedback sessions both with internal teams and the users, at a regular cadence. You are proficient in one or more of the following design tools: Figma, Sketch, Invision, Principle, Framer, Adobe suite. Bonus points for You are passionate about integrating your UX expertise with exploration of new technologies and business domains. You have some knowledge of Commercial Real Estate domain and can hit the ground running! What we’re offering You will have the opportunity to accelerate our rapidly growing organisation. We’re a lean team, so your impact will be felt immediately. Agile working environment with flexible working hours and location, career advancement, and competitive compensation package. GeoPhy is a family and pet friendly company. We arrange social activities to help our employees and families become familiar with each other and our culture. Diverse, unique colleagues from every corner of the world. If you’re convinced you are the right fit and you can’t wait to join our team, we look forward to hearing from you!

title: Machine Learning Engineer
summary:
Het bouwen van databases, herbruikbare software en robuuste data pijplijnen;
Dat je werkt op een innovatieve afdeling met grote hoeveelheden waardevolle data.
description: Stel je eens voor… dat je werkt op een innovatieve afdeling met grote hoeveelheden waardevolle data. Jij bouwt voor vooral ongestructureerde data de analytics producten die onze klanten en de bank écht verder helpen. En niet one-off producten, maar bouwt aan een modulair, schaalbaar platform.  Stel je voor dat je op een state-of-the-art Datalab werkt, waar je een dedicated data cluster hebt met alle open source tools die je nodig hebt om het verschil te maken. Vind jij het leuk om technisch complexe puzzels op te lossen? Om waarde toe te voegen door data en analytics écht te laten werken? Lees dan vooral verder! Impact creëren Het ontwikkelen van ons state of the art text-analytics platform van front to back; Het maken van oplossingen en architecturen die veilig en schaalbaar zijn; Het ontwikkelen, uitrollen en implementeren en gebruiken van de analytics producten; Het bouwen van databases, herbruikbare software en robuuste data pijplijnen; Het ontwerpen en opzetten van API’s en microservices; Met elkaar Samenwerken is de manier waarop we werken. Ons team Data Science & Business Consulting bundelt de krachten om de gehele organisatie te ondersteunen met data analytics toepassingen. Met jou erbij als Machine Learning Engineer staat de teller van het team op 45 diverse collega’s waaronder Data Scientists, Data Engineers en Business Consultants. Met jouw talenten Natuurlijk ben jij klantgericht, ben je gefocust op resultaat, kan je goed samen werken in teamverband en kijk je een outside-in naar de verschillende business puzzels. Juist die eigenschappen maken jou tot een goede Machine Learning Engineer. Daarbovenop is het belangrijk dat je alles op onderstaande checklist herkent: Relevante achtergrond in Computer Science of gerelateerde studies; Ervaring met Unix/Linux, GIT en Docker; Ervaring met Flask, Django, React, Angular of Vue; Database ervaring met PostgresSQL, Mongo, Elastic, Cassandra; Message queue engineering ervaring met Kafka, RabbitMQ; Ervaring met algemene programmeertalen zoals Java/C/C++/Python; Affiniteit met Machine Learning en werken in een analytics omgeving; Beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal. Bij de Rabobank Dat de Rabobank een financiële dienstverlener is voor meer dan 8,5 miljoen klanten in 40 landen, wist je vast al. Weet je ook dat we met elkaar werken aan een betere wereld? Dit doen we op 101 manieren, zoals: We zetten ons elke dag in om een duurzamere leefomgeving te creëren. We stimuleren bijvoorbeeld collega’s met het openbaar vervoer naar kantoor te komen en gebruiken groene energie. We hebben een samenwerkingsverband met het Rode Kruis waardoor je een bijdrage kunt leveren aan het verbeteren van de humanitaire hulp, bijvoorbeeld door het inzetten van data analyse. Wil jij dit ook? Wil je blijven leren en groeien? Wij helpen je er graag bij door jouw ontwikkeling centraal te stellen en te investeren in een omgeving waarin je blijft leren. We geven je de ruimte om te innoveren en ondernemen. Zo bieden we je volop groeikansen en helpen je verwachtingen te overtreffen en het goede buitengewoon goed te doen, zodat je kan groeien als professional. Daarbovenop kan je bij ons (o.b.v. een 36-urige werkweek) ook rekenen op: een salaris in schaal 8; een dertiende maand en vakantiegeld; een Employee Benefit Budget van 9% van je maandinkomen). Hoe jij dit budget inzet, is aan jou. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het kopen van extra vakantiedagen, een extra storting in je pensioen of zelfs het maandelijks laten uitbetalen van dit budget; een persoonlijk budget, dat je kunt besteden aan activiteiten gericht op jouw ontwikkeling en loopbaan; flexibiliteit in werktijden en locatie onafhankelijk werken; 100% vergoeding van woon- werkverkeer als je met ov reist! Toch met auto of motor? Kies dan voor een woon- werkverkeervergoeding; een pensioenregeling waar je zelf maar 3,5% aan bijdraagt.  Laten we kennismaken Ben jij hem/haar? Onze nieuwe collega die de Rabobank wil versterken als Machine Learning Engineer? En zo het verschil wil maken voor jezelf, onze klanten én de maatschappij? We ontvangen graag jouw sollicitatie op deze vacature. Handig om te weten: Hila Leupen-Turabaz, Senior Recruiter, beantwoordt met plezier vragen over de sollicitatieprocedure via mail, hila.leupen-turabaz@rabobank.nl. Screening is onderdeel van de sollicitatieprocedure. We toetsen op basis van de screening procedures die binnen de Rabobank gelden of nieuwe medewerkers voldoende betrouwbaar zijn om werkzaamheden bij de Rabobank te verrichten. Voor deze vacature maakt een individueel assessment deel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure. Wij willen jouw talent in de breedste zin van het woord inzetten en kijken graag breder naar jouw reactie dan deze vacature. Jouw profiel wordt meegenomen in de Sourcing Board Data & Analytics. Mocht je hier bezwaar tegen hebben dan kun je dit per mail aangeven bij Data.analytics@rabobank.nl. Jouw privacy is belangrijk voor ons. Mocht je hier meer over willen weten, klik dan deze link. Iedereen is anders, en juist de verschillen in mensen helpen ons om een nog betere bank te zijn. Daarom zijn we zijn benieuwd naar wie jíj bent! Vergeet niet aan je sollicitatie je motivatie toe te voegen en vertel in je motivatie meer over je interesse in deze functie.

title: Fellow Intern
summary:
You will also work with many experts, from data scientists and researchers to software and app designers.
Undergrad degree or Master’s degree in progress.
description: QUALIFICATIONS Undergrad degree or Master’s degree in progress Outstanding record of academic achievement Demonstrated aptitude for analytics Proven record of leadership in a work setting and/or through extracurricular activities Exceptional analytical and quantitative problem-solving skills Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment Ability to work effectively with people at all levels in an organization Ability to communicate complex ideas effectively – both verbally and in writing – in English and the local office language(s) Willingness to travel WHO YOU'LL WORK WITH You'll work in one of our offices around the world as a full-time intern for ~8-10 weeks; exact timing will vary by location. You'll be a part of a client project team, collaborating with colleagues and our clients to solve their toughest business problems. When you join McKinsey as a Fellow Intern, you are joining a firm that will challenge you and invest in your professional development. In this role you will work on the best teams to help the best organizations in the world – in private, public, and social sectors – solve their most difficult problems. You will also work with many experts, from data scientists and researchers to software and app designers. WHAT YOU'LL DO You’ll work in teams of typically 3 – 5 consultants, playing an active role in all aspects of the client engagement. This includes gathering and analyzing information, formulating and testing hypotheses, and developing and communicating recommendations. You’ll also have the opportunity to present results to client management and implement recommendations in collaboration with client team members. You’ll gain new skills and build on the strengths you bring to the firm. Interns receive exceptional training as well as frequent coaching and mentoring from colleagues on their teams. This support includes a Partner from your local office or practice assigned to you to help guide your career as well as formal training in your first few weeks as an Intern.  Additionally, you’ll receive guidance and support from your local office in the selection of client projects, helping you to develop your skills and build your network. Successful interns may be offered a full-time return offer.

title: Warehouse worker at a cooled warehouse
summary: XPO employs 1,800 IT professionals, including 100 data scientists, working on automation and intelligent machines, forecasting demand, predictive analytics,…
description: Job description Are you looking for a good salary and not bothered by the cold? We're looking for warehouse workers in a cooled warehouse in Tilburg, NL! Own housing needed.  This cooled warehouse exists of three different temperature zones. For working in the coldest section (-24 Celcius) special clothing and boots are provided to stay comfortable in the cold. These clothes are stored in a pre-heated locker, so you'll be warm as soon as you start your work. As a warehouse worker, you are responsible for picking, packing, scanning, kitting, counting, and several other warehouse tasks.  You can get up to 40 hours of work per week, but if you prefer you can choose to work part-time (2-3 days a week).  Working hours: Shift 1: 07.00 - 15.00 (optional) Shift 2: 15.00 - 23.00 Shift 3: 23.00 - 07:00  Shift bonus of 13,75% on full salary when working in a three-shift rotation. Shift bonus of 11,25% on full salary when working in two-shift rotation (including 1 day shift). Bonus of €34,73 per month when working consistently in the freezer zone. What do you bring? You have your own housing near Tilburg You have good English and/or Dutch communication skills (B1 or better) You are flexible and available long-term (3-23 months) You are able to read and understand work instructions You can interact with people from other cultural backgrounds You are focused on action and proactive You are trustworthy, purposeful, and have a strong endurance You are a team-player: a good atmosphere is important at this warehouse You have a clean VOG What's in it for you? Nice job at a fast-growing company with chances of promotion After proven good work: opportunities for a direct contract after max 78 weeks as a flex worker Personal contact with your job coach Weekly payments in full to your bank account Access to full healthcare insurance with discount €200 yearly for emergency dental care (if using our insurance) We offer support in applying for health care allowance (Zorgtoeslag) We will help you apply for Extra-Territorial Costs tax discount Opportunity to get a direct contract with the company or 5,5 years of working with EU-People Productivity bonus of up to €1,20/hour, determined by your picks per day Remarks XPO Logistics is an American multinational transportation and contract logistics company that manages supply chains for 50,000 customers. It operates in 30 countries, with approximately 100,000 employees.  XPO is a tech leader in the transportation and logistics industry, spending between 500–550 million €/year on software development, automation, and technological hardware. XPO employs 1,800 IT professionals, including 100 data scientists, working on automation and intelligent machines, forecasting demand, predictive analytics, pricing algorithms, workforce planning, load and route optimization, customer service, and its digital freight marketplace.  Tilburg is a city in the province of North-Brabant.

title: Senior Technician Vaccine Generation
summary:
USP associate scientist/senior technician Vaccine Generation.
Ensure high-quality, timely data analysis, documentation in laboratory notebooks and technical…
description: USP associate scientist/senior technician Vaccine Generation Department / project: The Vaccine Generation group is a part of the Viral Vaccine department of Janssen Vaccines & Prevention (JVP) and focuses on the research and development of vaccines against viral infectious diseases. The group is responsible for the design, generation, production, and characterization of recombinant viral vectors, for applied research in the vaccine field. Interaction with R&D groups in the organization is an important aspect of our work. You will join a stimulating group of researchers in a very collaborative environment. We are looking for an Associate Scientist/ Senior Technician to strengthen our upstream processing/bioreactor team in developing innovative vaccine candidates aimed to prevent and treat life-threatening diseases Job description: The focus of the Vaccine Generation group is to produce small-scale adenoviral vector preparations and test their manufacturability to support the progression of potential vaccine candidates towards the development. As an experienced Associate Scientist, you will join a diverse team working on programs to develop (adeno) viral vector-based vaccines, expanding our knowledge on our vaccine platforms, and develop innovative vaccine processes and technologies. We are looking for a motivated Associate Scientist within the field of upstream process development. Under limited supervision, but as part of our lab team, you will support the preparation and execution of scientific studies. You will be responsible for the practical testing performance of new vectors and/or cells at the 2L bioreactor scale. In addition, this position requires a special interest and talent for data analysis, documentation, and reporting. Next to this, there is room to work on continuous improvement topics to increase safety, efficiency in workflow, and support of scientific projects. Experiments will be performed in bioreactors or in a reduced-scale shaker flask model. Excellent verbal, presentation and written communication skills are essential and the capability to effectively work in a team environment is required. Expected activities include but are not limited to: Build up and operating bioreactors Sample analyses Ensure high-quality, timely data analysis, documentation in laboratory notebooks and technical reports Provide support to multiple projects Work across organizational boundaries  Qualifications Minimum Qualifications: Education: You have an M.Sc., B.Sc, HBO with 5 years of experience in a relevant discipline like biotechnology or pharmacy. You have a strong affinity with upstream process development, as demonstrated by experience with mammalian, bacterial, or other cultivation techniques, hands-on experience with bioreactors, preferably at lab scale. You are a motivated team player who is flexible and has a can-do attitude and a pro-active mindset. You have good communication skills in Dutch and/or English. After your training period, your will occasionally be expected to work during weekend hours. Specific Knowledge: Experience with adenoviral vectors is a plus. Competences: Strong interest in bioprocess technology Strongly motivated and independent Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail Strong level of written and oral English Proficient user of MS Office, Excel, Word, PowerPoint Organized and highly accurate Dynamic, flexible, open and research focused demeanor  Primary Location Netherlands-South Holland-Leiden- Organization Janssen Vaccines & Prevention BV (8852) Job Function R&D Requisition ID 2105888455W

title: IT Technician
summary: A group working on big data analytics and data integration, bioinformatics, artificial intelligence, simulation of physical systems, mathematical modelling,…
description: We are looking for a full-time IT Support Technician with experience managing Google Workspace, including mobile device management, and Cloud-based infrastructure. You will be responsible for providing day-to-day IT support for all users and devices. Full-time · Maastricht Your responsibilities  Manage users and company-owned inventory, ensuring that systems are secure and compliant. Installing operating systems and applications. Troubleshoot hardware and software issues. Monitor and test local networks to ensure optimal performance and security. Manage aspects of Google Workspace. Provide on-demand IT support for all users.  You will be part of  The Scientific Computing Team at Mosa Meat. This group of scientists is responsible for the development of a diverse range of solutions for the acceleration of scientific discovery at Mosa Meat.  A group working on big data analytics and data integration, bioinformatics, artificial intelligence, simulation of physical systems, mathematical modelling, image analysis and computer vision. What we're looking for Completed secondary vocational education in an IT related field or similar (min. MBO). Experience with Google Workspace, especially mobile device management. 0-2 years of experience in a similar role. Experience troubleshooting systems. The ideal candidate will be/have Organised and proactive. Ability to priortise workload effectively. Strong problem-solving skills. Good interpersonal skills. An eye for detail. A good command of the English language. Must have permission to work in the EU.  What you can expect from us We are a committed team working on an innovation that will have a huge global impact. As part of this exciting project, we promise that you will get to: Enjoy an enterprising work culture with lots of freedom in your projects. Combine science with a commercial goal. Enjoy 25 days of paid leave per year. Work in the beautiful, historical city of Maastricht. Enjoy flexible working hours. In case you have any questions, you can contact Alex at alexander@mosameat.com. We really look forward to hearing about you. Please submit your application and we will get back to you shortly. We will be reviewing our application on a rolling basis.

title: Tech Lead IT Data Lake Gall & Gall
summary:
Thor is a state of the art, scalable data platform, meant to serve all of AH future data needs.
Design and co-develop architectures for new product applications…
description: Jouw nieuwe baan en werkplek Join AH Technology: Reinventing Food Retail every day. Ensuring the delivery of valuable solutions and quality that comply with the highest quality standards for Gall & Gall’s Data Lake platform.  Being a Tech Lead for the AH Technology and especially at our Gall & Gall domain, means you are technically responsible for Gall & Gall’s Data Lake. You will act as the stream lead for AH Technology’s generic platform, called Thor. Thor is a state of the art, scalable data platform, meant to serve all of AH future data needs. You will participate in standups and refinements, come up with application and data architecture solutions, build code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, coach junior team members and manage deployments. As the Tech Lead Data Lake you will translate the roadmap to valuable tech solutions and will contribute to the initiation of new initiatives. Just like a kind of Solution Architect if you will. In this awesome role you will also provide feedback on the technical standards and guidelines, taking into account the Enterprise Architecture and you will give clear guidance to both business and development teams. You will/can have weekly’s with Gall & Gall’s Head of Tech. On weekly basis you will have Architecture and Technological deep dive sessions with your peer Tech Leads. From day to day you will work closely with the Business Product Owner, responsible for the requirements, to identify the non-functional requirements that you need to manage. Your efforts as an SME on Data will help the teams to deliver outstanding results. More specifically, as Tech Lead Data Lake you will: Design, build and manage all of Gall & Gall’s data pipelines, both batch and real-time; Design and co-develop architectures for new product applications (data, infrastructure, privacy and security); Understand the integration architecture and business process architecture; Be a valued team member, who coaches, facilitates and removes obstacles; Put the organization in a position to deliver value as quickly as possible; Ensure this is done using the most efficient and effective process; Form a team with the Product Owner; Work closely with the Tech Lead MDM, Data Engineers, Testers, peer Tech Leads and Head of Tech to design the future of Gall & Gall's Data Lake and other stream leads for AH Technology's Thor platform.  Your new office Albert Heijn, part of Ahold Delhaize, is the number one omnichannel food retailer in the Netherlands. We’ve been inspiring customers and building trust for more than 130 years. We like to say, “We’re always there for you,” and with more than 1000 stores in the Netherlands and Belgium and 24/7 shopping on ah.nl, it’s truer than ever! But now we want to take our business to the next level. By making better food accessible to everyone, and by making shopping fit the way people live today. By joining our team, you become part of AH Technology, where you can make your mark on the daily lives of millions of people. AH Technology is a department-transcending community consisting of the departments Data, Digital and Tech within Albert Heijn. Our smart professionals create digital solutions that make (online) shopping simpler and more inspiring. We’re continually rethinking the way people shop, pay and even enjoy food. That’s why we’re investing heavily in data, digital and tech, to further transform Albert Heijn into a leading Food & Tech company.Curious about your colleagues? At AH Technology you work with the best experts in the field in an open environment, where expertise is valued, where we learn from each other and have the freedom to innovate. You will work in the Gall & Gall Tech domain. This department has about 45 members of staff and various teams, with 6 members on average in each team (but this changes from time to time). You will form a team with the Product Owner and will work together with peer Tech Leads, Architects, Engineers, Data Scientists, Analysts, Testers and Head of Tech to design the future of the Gall & Gall platforms.Are you going to help us to continue to build a successful IT organization? For more information about AH Technology, you can also visit our Stack Overflow page: https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/companies/ah-technology-albert-heijn  Covid-19 Our main priority continues to be the health and safety of our employees and customers. Due to the Covid-19 pandemic, this position will be remote until further notice. We will continue to monitor the circumstances and when we feel comfortable, this position will return to our Headquarters in Zaandam. There you will have the opportunity to collaborate face-to-face with a talented and diverse group of colleagues. This also means that all job interviews for this position will take place through video calls. Dit bieden we jou We do we offer? At AH Technology we aim to grow, and this is only possible if you grow along with us. As we work together to build our brand and your career, you can count on (based on 40 hours per week): A competitive annual gross salary up to € 85,000; A bonus on top of your salary; 20 vacation days and a Personal Budget for you to decide whether to spend it on 12.5 extra vacation days, discounts or a pay-out; Flexible working hours; An excellent pension plan with a personal contribution of 6.2%; A travel allowance for traveling to and from Zaandam; Attractive discounts on various insurance policies; 10% staff discount on groceries in all Albert Heijn stores, to a maximum of €300 per year; A company laptop and telephone. Dit breng je mee Requirements: At AH Technology, you'll be working for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands. To become successful as our new Tech Lead Data Lake for Gall & Gall you bring: A Technology/IT Engineering Bachelor certificate or Master degree; At least 5 years’ experience as a Data Engineer working in a complex (corporate) Technology environment. Experience as a Senior / Lead Engineer is a major advantage; Knowledge of Azure, Python, Spark; Knowledge and experience on Agile. Certification in one of these areas is not required; An outstanding command of English and Dutch; Excellent communication skills and the ability to motivate people; A natural affinity for stakeholder management; Experience in the field of Retail Tech and particularly Data Engineering in this domain would be an advantage;  Apply now! Do you want to play an active role in changing the food retail landscape as we know it? Then hop on board and join us on our expedition. Apply online before April 1st. We would also like to ask you not to send a standard motivation letter, but to formulate an answer to the following questions: Why would you like to work for AH Technology? Why do you think you will be successful in this position, and what kind of skills do you bring for this role? What is one of your personal strengths and one skill you wish to improve or develop?  Would you like to learn more first, before you apply to AH Technology? Micha Lekawael, Talent Acquisition Partner – Technology, will be happy to tell you all about this vacancy and AH Technology at Micha.Lekawael@ah.nl. title: Research Technician: Structural Chemical Biology
summary: The successful applicant will work in close collaboration with PhD students, senior scientists on the establishment of new model proteins in our lab.
description: Location: AMSTERDAM FTE: 0.5 - 0,5 Job description The Biomimetic and Structural Chemical Biology group, located at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is looking for technical assistance with experience in molecular biology. Our international research group is active in the field of biomimetics and protein engineering with a strong focus on the design of peptide-inspired ligands and structural elucidation. In the group, such tools are used to develop bioactive compounds for the inhibition of protein‒protein interactions and for the stabilization of protein structure. The successful applicant will work in close collaboration with PhD students, senior scientists on the establishment of new model proteins in our lab. In addition he/she will assist during crystallization of ligand‒protein complexes and stabilized proteins. Additional information about the group are available online: https://research.vu.nl/en/persons/sven-hennig  Your duties Play a constructive and responsible role in the daily management of the laboratory. You will be establishing the expression and purification of new proteins for our lab, assist in crystallization and organize the lab. Therefore, you will assist in planning and executing of sub-cloning into bacterial expression plasmids analyze sequencing of sub-cloning results establish protein expression conditions (various strains and growth conditions) establish purification protocols produce proteins along already established protocols assist in setting up crystallization trials using high end liquid handling robotics assist in organizing the lab Requirements We are looking for a motivated candidate with an established track record in molecular biology, bacterial protein expression and protein purification. Experience in protein crystallization or peptide synthesis are beneficial. a qualification in laboratory skills, i.e. Hoger Laboratorium Onderwijs or equivalent demonstrated hands-on experience with molecular biology techniques such as PCR, different sub-cloning techniques, analyzing Sanger sequencing experience in protein purification, including bacterial protein expression, affinity purification (Aekta FPLC), size exclusion chromatography, SDS-PAGE strong communication, organizational and social skills high competence in either English or Dutch is an absolute requirement (both are preferred) team player with the ability to work independently strong motivation for scientific research What are we offering? A challenging position in a socially involved organization. On full-time basis the remuneration amounts to a minimum gross monthly salary of €2,656 (scale 8) and a maximum €3,548 (scale 8), depending on your education and experience. The job profile: is based on the university job ranking system and is vacant for 0.5 FTE.  The initial employment contract will affect a period of 1 year, with the possibility of extension. Additionally, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam offers excellent fringe benefits and various schemes and regulations to promote a good work/life balance, such as: a maximum of 41 days of annual leave based on full-time employment 8% holiday allowance and 8.3% end-of-year bonus solid pension scheme (ABP) contribution to commuting expenses optional model for designing a personalized benefits package  About Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam The ambition of Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is clear: to contribute to a better world through outstanding education and ground-breaking research. We strive to be a university where personal development and commitment to society play a leading role. A university where people from different disciplines and backgrounds collaborate to achieve innovations and to generate new knowledge. Our teaching and research encompass the entire spectrum of academic endeavour – from the humanities, the social sciences and the natural sciences through to the life sciences and the medical sciences.  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is home to more than 26,000 students. We employ over 4,600 individuals. The VU campus is easily accessible and located in the heart of Amsterdam’s Zuidas district, a truly inspiring environment for teaching and research.  Diversity We are an inclusive university community. Diversity is one of our most important values. We believe that engaging in international activities and welcoming students and staff from a wide variety of backgrounds enhances the quality of our education and research. We are always looking for people who can enrich our world with their own unique perspectives and experiences.  The Faculty of Science The Faculty of Science inspires researchers and students to find sustainable solutions for complex societal issues. From forest fires to big data, from obesity to medicines and from molecules to the moon: our teaching and research programmes cover the full spectrum of the natural sciences. We share knowledge and experience with leading research institutes and industries, both here in the Netherlands and abroad.  Working at the Faculty of Science means working with students, PhD candidates and researchers, all with a clear focus on their field and a broad view of the world. We employ more than 1,250 staff members, and we are home to around 6,000 students.  Biomimetics and Structural Chemical Biology Group The Biomimetics and Structural Chemical Biology group belongs to the organic chemistry division. We are part of the Department of Chemistry and Pharmaceutical Sciences of the Faculty of Science, and are part of the Amsterdam Institute for Molecules, Medicines and Systems (AIMMS). Within the Biomimetic and Structural Chemical Biology group we are interested in designing and synthesizing ligand inspired peptidomimetics to modulate protein functions such as transcriptional activity. In addition, we apply our knowledge of peptide modifications to the chemical modification and stabilization of folded proteins. Structural elucidation via X-ray protein crystallography belongs to our core competences. The section is also involved in education within the Bachelor's and/or Master's degree programs in Pharmaceutical Sciences, Medical Natural Sciences, Science Business and Innovation and Biomolecular Sciences at VU University Amsterdam, as well as the Joint Degree Chemistry (VU University and University of Amsterdam).  Application Are you interested in this position? Please apply via the application button and upload your curriculum vitae, letter of motivation, track records and details of references (all in English) until April 1 , 2020 .  Applications received by e-mail will not be processed.  Vacancy questions If you have any questions regarding this vacancy, you may contact:  Name: Dr. Sven Hennig Position: Assistant Professor Structural Chemical Biology/ Head of Crystallography E-mail: s.hennig@vu.nl  No agencies

title: Testdata engineer - Amersfoort
summary:
Minimaal 2 jaar ervaring als (test)data analyst of scientist.
Veilig werken met data van klanten en medewerkers.
Pak de regie om jouw werk zelf vorm te geven.
description: Daarom wil je als testdata engineer AVG bij NS werken Draag zorg voor de uitvoering van het testdata-beleid compliant aan AVG binnen NS. Creëer verbinding met alle IT-afdelingen om AVG compliant te blijven. Pak de regie om jouw werk zelf vorm te geven. Pieter: “De lat voor de kwaliteit, en dus ook voor het testen, ligt erg hoog.”  Dit ga je doen als testdata engineer Veilig werken met data van klanten en medewerkers. Daar moet het een en ander voor gedaan worden om te zorgen dat we AVG-proof blijven. Jij als testdata engineer AVG maakt er werk van samen met jouw team. Van het aanmaken van fictieve data tot het aanpassen van de applicatiesoftware, onze IT-afdelingen weten jou daar wel voor te vinden. Met andere woorden, je bent veel in contact met collega’s van verschillende onderdelen binnen NS. Hier krijg je de vrijheid om zelf jouw dagindeling vorm te geven. Daarin durf je initiatief te nemen, want we hebben de privacyregeling hoog in het vaandel staan. Dankzij jouw sterke communicatievaardigheden en doorzettingsvermogen ben jij van onschatbare waarde bij het: Inrichten en gebruiken van de testdata management tooling van Broadcom. Schakelen tussen collega’s om te kijken waar verbeteringen doorgevoerd moeten worden. Onderhouden en verder ontwikkelen van huidige en nieuwe testdatasets. Voor losse applicaties, maar wel consistent over complexe ketens.  Hier ga jij werken Je komt in een nieuw Testdata Managementteam terecht binnen de afdeling Test Competence Center. Het team bestaat nu uit 6 (externe) collega’s. Hoewel we veel vanuit huis werken, sta je er nooit alleen voor. We beginnen namelijk elke werkdag met een korte online meeting. Even een moment om te bespreken waar iedereen mee bezig is en welke successen er zijn behaald. In 2021 transformeren we van een projectorganisatie naar een eigen lijnafdeling. Daar hebben we jouw input zeker voor nodig. En de onderlinge werksfeer? Die kan je het best beschrijven als professioneel en relaxt. Zo ervaren jouw toekomstige collega’s het werken bij NS: Lies – manager ICT Stefan – applicatie consultant  Dit neem je mee Een hbo- of wo-werk- en -denkniveau. Minimaal 2 jaar ervaring als (test)data analyst of scientist. Ervaring met SQL. Bekendheid met Agile en DevOps. Een verbindende werkhouding waarmee je snel schakelt tussen verschillende disciplines binnen NS. Een pragmatische instelling.  Dit zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden Werken bij NS betekent dat jij hét verschil kunt maken in de wereld van duurzame mobiliteit. Je maakt deel uit van een organisatie die midden in de maatschappij staat en Nederland in beweging brengt. Maar als 1 van de grootste werkgevers van Nederland hebben we je zoveel meer te bieden. Voor deze functie is dit onder andere: Een maximaal salaris van € 5.149,08 bruto per maand (o.b.v. 36-urige werkweek). Een 36-urige werkweek. Vijf weken vakantie (o.b.v. fulltime dienstverband). Hier bovenop bouw je ook nog ruim een week extra verlof op. De mogelijkheid om 3 christelijke feestdagen om te ruilen voor 3 niet-christelijke feestdagen. 3% eindejaarsuitkering, 8% vakantietoeslag en een uitstekende pensioenregeling. Je treinreizen in de 2e klas zijn gratis; in de 1e klas reizen kan tegen een kleine eigen bijdrage. Gratis treinreizen in de daluren voor je gezinsleden. Korting op Europese treinreizen zodra je 1 jaar bij NS werkt. Professionele ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden en een keuzeplan. De mogelijkheid tot thuiswerken en flexibele werktijden (in overleg). Bij goed functioneren, krijg je na een jaar een vast contract. Wil je alles tot in detail weten? Bekijk dan hier de NS cao.  Solliciteren naar deze baan Solliciteer direct via de sollicitatiebutton. Binnen enkele minuten ontvang je een automatische sollicitatiebevestiging, binnen 2 weken reageren wij op jouw sollicitatie. Je kunt je sollicitatie richten aan Sander Smorenberg, recruiter Nog vragen? Mail naar Karin van onze frontoffice via: recruitment@ns.nl. Heb je liever telefonisch contact? Kijk dan op onze website voor de actuele telefoonnummers. Goed om te weten: Vanwege de coronamaatregelen hebben wij onze sollicitatieprocedure aangepast. Lees hier wat je kunt verwachten. Een achtergrondonderzoek, met o.a. VOG (Verklaring omtrent Gedrag), maakt deel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure. Denk hierbij ook aan het tekenen van een integriteitsverklaring en geheimhoudingsverklaring. We vinden het belangrijk dat iedereen die bij ons werkt zich thuis voelt. Dit zie je in alles wat we doen, en dus ook in ons aannamebeleid. Lees hier meer. Met deze vacature willen wij zelf onze nieuwe collega werven. Dit is dan ook géén oproep voor acquisitie.

title: Inside Sales Specialist - Netherlands
summary:
Maintain a CRM database via updates to sales opportunities, sales stages, marketing statuses, and customer intelligence data.
What You'll Be Doing:
description: Reporting to the Inside Sales Manager, the Inside Sales Specialist is assigned to a geographic territory and responsible for lead generation and development, and management of transactional business. His/Her main duty will be to creatively develop and turn opportunities into orders, while partnering with Outside Sales Account Managers to maximize efforts in growing the company's business. This position is both exciting and challenging, as you will be working with scientists in top-level academic institutions, biotechnology and pharma companies. What You'll Be Doing: Effectively prospect to find and close new opportunities in existing and new accounts. Serve as the initial point of contact for pre-sales customer inquiries Manage the sales process for specific products, accounts and/or sales opportunities via phone and e-mail. Engage with existing customers and generating sales leads. Manage trade show leads and their respective qualifications. Prospect Outbound Leads Work well in team environment, partnering with field sales organization - Develop a joint plan and strategy to meet or exceed targets Route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales executives for further development and closure Focus on strategic opportunities that can drive business in the long- and short-term (Retargeting, Dormant accounts) Close Sales and Achieve Quarterly Targets Work collaboratively with Marketing to drive product promotions and provide feedback Maintain a CRM database via updates to sales opportunities, sales stages, marketing statuses, and customer intelligence data. Answer incoming calls, places outbound calls, and responds to emails in a timely manner Attend customer meetings, conferences, tradeshows. What You'll Bring to the Team: Genetics or Molecular Biology background required; with a minimum of 1-2 years Inside Sales related experience. Languages: French/English or German/English or Spanish/English (less required) or Dutch/English Geography: ideally located in the territory of their main language (France, Germany, Netherlands) Thrives on team work and excels at being part of a team Infectious "get it done" attitude with a strong desire to WIN Excels in a fast-paced, ambitious, and changing landscape Work with Salesforce.com or other CRM Ability to travel up to 20% Solid analytical skills Ability to work cross-functionally to drive orders Strong attention to detail EDUCATION: Bachelor's degree (B.A./B.S) from four year College or university preferred in Biology. About Twist Bioscience Twist Bioscience synthesizes genes from scratch, known as "writing" DNA. Just as children learn to both read and write, the next phase of development for the genomics revolution is the ability to write DNA. At Twist Bioscience, we work in service of people who are changing the world for the better. In fields such as health care, agriculture, industrial chemicals and data storage, our unique silicon-based DNA Synthesis Platform provides precision at a scale that is otherwise unavailable to our customers. Twist Bioscience Corporation is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Twist Bioscience Corporation provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, genetic characteristics, or any other category protected by law.  #LI-AB1

title: Senior Data Engineer
summary:
Take ownership of large production data systems to support a variety of growing data needs.
Deep knowledge of SQL fundamentals, and solid understanding of best…
description: Tiqets is one of the fastest-growing tech scale-ups in the Netherlands. To keep it moving fast and making culture more accessible, we’re hiring a Senior Data Engineer to join us! Full-time · Amsterdam Who are we? We’re revolutionising the way people buy tickets to culture and attractions all over the world. Our technology lets users easily book tickets to the best attractions in seconds, meaning customers can enter museums, zoos, theme parks, and more faster than ever. We’re dedicated to bringing simplicity to the world of travel and entertainment. If you want to join our team, working as a Senior Data engineer, send us your CV. We might be looking for YOU! Our values Be accessible: Help out, communicate honestly, and be there for each other. Be remarkable: Have fun, think creatively, and celebrate great moments together. Skip the line: Be fast, flexible, and smart; take responsibility and push forward. Life at Tiqets What you will do Tiqets is positioned for explosive growth in the post-pandemic world, and we're looking for an experienced Data Engineer to help us scale our Data Platform for the future. As a Senior Data Engineer you will be involved in designing and building out much of the core Data Platform being used by the company. You will be working closely with Data Scientists, Analysts, Engineers as well as Product and Marketing teams to understand their needs and architect systems to solve these needs. You’re an experienced Data Engineer with a passion for architecting resilient and reliable data systems. You obsess over data quality and operational excellence, build clean and efficient Data Pipelines, and constantly look for ways to make systems better. You see the value in being a data-driven organization. Researching or building MVPs is an important part of your role. You’re curious about new technologies, both open-source and SaaS. You like to work in a fast-paced environment and iterate quickly while continuing to build for the medium and long term.  Responsibilities Architect, build and improve our Data Platform and analytics infrastructure Take ownership of large production data systems to support a variety of growing data needs Design and implement fault-tolerant, resilient ELT/ETL pipelines using open source tools like Airflow or hosted AWS/SaaS services Build monitoring tools to help meet our data quality/availability SLAs and ensure high-availability for our infrastructure Assist in making important technical decisions to help scale the Data Platform for the medium and long term Manage large-scale data infrastructure and take full ownership of what you build Be a leader on the Data team by mentoring junior team members and setting a high standard for best practices Support Data Scientists and Data Analysts on the team to productionize their workflows, while building tools and infrastructure to improve their speed and effectiveness  Minimum qualifications Bachelor or Master in Computer Science, or other relevant technical education. 5+ years experience working as an Engineer on data-intensive applications, architecting large-scale production systems Substantial experience with Python and other scripting languages with a track record of writing clean, efficient code Experience using core Data Engineering technologies like Airflow and DBT Worked with AWS services like Redshift, Kinesis, Lambda, Glue, Athena Strong understanding of relational databases like PostgreSQL, as well as Data Warehousing technologies like Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake, etc.  Deep knowledge of SQL fundamentals, and solid understanding of best practices with respect to data warehousing, data modeling and schema design DevOps mindset; experience deploying applications using technologies like Kubernetes and Docker on AWS Experience with event pipelines and real-time streaming use cases  Nice to Have Experience Business Intelligence tools like Looker, Tableau, Data Studio Machine Learning technologies like AWS Sagemaker and MLflow SaaS tools like Segment, Fivetran, Stitch, Snowplow Experience in the e-commerce domain Our Data Engineering Stack AWS  Python  Airflow  Redshift  DBT  Looker Perks & Benefits at Tiqets Young, dynamic, international working environment Bright, welcoming office located in the centre of Amsterdam Opportunity to make an impact in the fastest growing tech scaleup 20% personal Tiqets discount code to explore great museums/venues worldwide Annual company getaway to undisclosed location Health insurance Tiqets learning academy: skill lab, group & individual learningTuesday's Pizza & beer sessions Friday drinks Visa sponsorship Summer party Competitive salary and paid holiday leave Sports activities: free gym, running sessions, boot-camp, football, climbing and more Pension scheme and travel compensation Everyone - employed at Tiqets will receive a monthly contribution for working from home Everyone - employed at Tiqets can reimburse home work space necessities Meet the Team

title: Technician Upstream Processing
summary:
Experience with performing data analysis, troubleshooting and drafting SOP’s and protocols;
You will be responsible for organizing, planning and executing your…
description: Technician Upstream Processing Begin als (Senior) Technician Upstream Processing consultant bij onze opdrachtgever. Dit mooie bedrijf in Zuid-Holland is gespecialiseerd in R&D en procesontwikkeling voor klanten. Denk hierbij aan medicijnontdekking, tot clinic. Ze hebben deskundig personeel, een mooi academisch netwerk, en een groot aanbod aan high-end services. Zit jij straks helemaal op je plek bij onze opdrachtgever? Dan heb je na verloop van tijd wellicht de mogelijkheid om daar in dienst te treden. Als (Senior) Technician Upstream Processing werk je voornamelijk mee aan het ontwikkelen van vaccins. Activiteiten die daarbij horen, zijn: upstream process development (mammalian and microbial cell platforms), medium development, scale up in bioreactors and clinical manufacturing in GMP facility. Jouw taken als Technician Upstream Processing Production platforms range from shake flasks and roller bottles up to cell factories, suspension formats and fixed-bed bioreactors; You will be responsible for organizing, planning and executing your own experiments under supervision of a scientist; You will get acquainted with new equipment and techniques and will also be responsible for writing SOP’s and protocols; On a regular basis, you will present your results within the USP department. You will support and execute general maintenance lab tasks; Most of the work will be performed under BSL2 or BSL3 conditions. Functie eisen Senior Technician Upstream Processing BSc or MSc degree in life sciences, biochemistry, biochemical engineering or related subject; Experience in a biotechnology or biopharmaceutical industry environment; Experience 1+ years with bioreactors; Experience with virus-based assays; Experience with performing data analysis, troubleshooting and drafting SOP’s and protocols; Good command of the English language (written and spoken). Je sluit je aan bij een ambitieuze groep internationale onderzoekers, in een zeer collaboratieve omgeving. Niet alleen jouw groei in wetenschappelijke kennis wordt gestimuleerd, maar ook persoonlijke groei vinden ze erg belangrijk. Waarom werken bij Yxion? De kracht van Yxion is het maken van de perfecte match tussen consultant en opdrachtgever: We zijn een onafhankelijke consultancy organisatie die gericht is op de farmaceutische industrie, healthcare en food branche. Wij geven je de kans om afwisselend bij de meest interessante bedrijven aan de slag te gaan. Dit kan een project zijn van een half jaar, maar ook een project van meerdere jaren. We vinden het belangrijk om eerst met jou in gesprek te gaan, zodat we kunnen achterhalen wat jouw persoonlijke voorkeuren zijn bij het zoeken naar een nieuwe opdracht. Op deze manier kunnen wij de beste fit maken tussen jou en opdrachtgever. Wanneer je eenmaal een opdracht hebt, neemt de betrokkenheid van Yxion niet af. Je blijft in contact met David, de operationeel manager. Tijdens deze ontmoetingen bespreken jullie de werkzaamheden, ervaringen en werksfeer. Op deze manier blijven wij op de hoogte van jouw ontwikkelingen, en kunnen we waarborgen dat je met plezier naar je werk gaat. Successen vieren we graag samen. Het harde werken wordt gevierd door het organiseren van borrels, barbecues en uitjes. Zo zijn we vorig jaar met alle consultants en het kantoorpersoneel naar de Winterefteling geweest. Kortom: afwisseling, uitdaging & toch zekerheid! Leren aan de Yxion Academy Persoonlijke ontwikkeling staat bij Yxion hoog in het vaandel. Zo hebben we onze eigen Yxion Academy. Tijdens een Academy training kun je naar verschillende interessante presentaties luisteren. Naast bijdrages van onze eigen Yxion collega’s, nodigen we hiervoor ook externe sprekers uit. Bijvoorbeeld experts uit de pharma, healthcare en food branche, die je vertellen over de nieuwste ontwikkelingen of hun toekomstvisie op de branche. Arbeidsvoorwaarden consultant Yxion De salarisindicatie ligt tussen de € 3000 - € 6500 bruto per maand o.b.v. 40 uur (afhankelijk van functie en senioriteitsniveau); 25 vakantiedagen; Pensioenopbouw; Balans tussen werk & privé (thuiswerken + aanpassing arbeidsduur); Verzekeringen (WIA, WA & ongevallenverzekering); Goede reiskostenvergoeding; Bonusregelingen; Lease-auto behoort tot de mogelijkheden. Solliciteren Technician Upstream Processing Geïnteresseerd in deze functie? Solliciteer dan direct of neem contact op met onze recruiter Loc Pham. Loc is per mail bereikbaar, of op telefoonnummer 0682215174.

title: Order picker at an e-commerce warehouse
summary: XPO employs 1,800 IT professionals, including 100 data scientists, working on automation and intelligent machines, forecasting demand, predictive analytics,…
description: Job description Great logistics opportunity for order pickers at a warehouse in Oosterhout, NL. An e-commerce warehouse is looking for order pickers to support their team long-term. This company's activities are expanding quickly, so they offer promotions for professional and hard-working people.  The warehouse has modern facilities, such as a well-equipped canteen with daily fresh products for low prices. During the 1st and 2nd shifts, this catering is opened. For the 3rd shift, microwaveable meals are available in vending machines. You'll receive a special bottle to take fresh, cold water with you while you work.  As an order picker, you're responsible for processing the warehouse orders. You'll make sure that the right products get picked to be shipped to the right customer. An EPT and hand scanner will help you while picking the orders. You'll also be stacking products on pallets and do some unpacking of incoming products when needed.  Building a career in a warehouse means joining a large community of dedicated, hard-working and energized individuals who pride themselves on their commitment and work ethic. You can work in this warehouse as a flex-worker for max 78 weeks. When delivering good work, you may be offered a long-term contract with the company directly.  Working hours (times are subject to change): Shift 1: 06:00 - 14:00 Shift 2: 14:00 - 22:00 Shift 3: 22:00 - 06:00 What do you bring? Intermediate English and/or Dutch communication skills (B1 or better) Experience with order picking of +2 months is preferred Experience with EPT preferred Dutch reach truck certificate preferred You have your own transport to work You're willing to work here for a long time (up to 78 weeks) You're willing to work in shifts and on Saturdays You're flexible and willing to work at different departments when needed You're a quick thinker, quick learner, and like to act fast You're healthy and like to work You have a clean criminal record (VOG) What's in it for you? Nice job at a fast-growing company with chances of promotion Opportunity to get a direct contract Comfortable company housing available - within 10km from work Personal contact with your job coach 24 hours emergency service Weekly payments - always on time and in full - to your bank account Access to full healthcare insurance with a discount €200 yearly for emergency dental care (when using our insurance) We offer support in applying for health care allowance (Zorgtoeslag) We will help you apply for Extra-Territorial Costs tax discount Work at a fast-growing company with chances of promotion Remarks XPO Logistics is an American multinational transportation and contract logistics company that manages supply chains for 50,000 customers. It operates in 30 countries, with approximately 100,000 employees.  XPO is a tech leader in the transportation and logistics industry, spending between 500–550 million €/year on software development, automation, and technological hardware. XPO employs 1,800 IT professionals, including 100 data scientists, working on automation and intelligent machines, forecasting demand, predictive analytics, pricing algorithms, workforce planning, load and route optimization, customer service, and its digital freight marketplace.  Tilburg is a city in the province of North-Brabant.

title: Interaction Designer
summary: You are part of a NGDA (Next Generation Digital Architecture) Product team which exists of a product owner, developers, data engineers, architects and…
description: The team You are part of a NGDA (Next Generation Digital Architecture) Product team which exists of a product owner, developers, data engineers, architects and scientists. Working primarily from Dublin but also remotely across Europe, this team is transforming our interaction with Suppliers in our Operations departments into a fully digital process. What are you going to do Design a family of B2B and B2C tools in our ecosystem that helps customers and partners, including conducting user research (with the support of our research team) to discover problems and validate your ideas and solutions. Extend existing interaction patterns in our design system to help perform their tasks as easy as possible. Closely work with the product owner to hit the sweet spot to solve both business and customers' problems. Including constructively challenge business cases to make sure we're solving a real customers problem. Facilitating cross-role workshop to solve complex problems. Work closely with the developers as they ship your design. Product Design Skills Interaction Design (key focus) Understanding of complex workflows designed to scale across diverse products. You are an expert in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, personas and journeys. Experience with web-forms/complex interfaces/interactions Knowledge of usability and best practice Experience designing for a variety of device types, experience with responsive design. Ability to rapidly ideate and produce multiple UX concepts Proficient in Sketch, Invision, and Abstract Research Experience planning and conducting research including customer visits, usability studies, surveys, and feedback sessions General Degree in Interaction Design, Human Computer Interaction or comparable 5 years of experience as a Designer The communication skills to clearly articulate your concepts and evangelize on their behalf. Experience working in continuous delivery environments where the pace is fast. Experience working within corporate environments (Banks, Airports, E-commerce, etc) An appreciation of A/B testing and using data to inform design decisions Earnest, mature, and ego-free. You welcome candid feedback, and can constructively give it as well. Curious to investigate new tooling such as Framer X Contributing and supporting design system Meet the design team We are a mixed team(+10 members) of product/visual/interaction designers, service designers, and UX researchers. Our team works collaboratively with stakeholders from the business, developers and the customer. We design and deliver multiple products within LeasePlan. When a request or a new feature needs to be designed it is our job to represent the user and make sure the business goals are met, with the user in mind. As a team we work to understand the users need and translate this to our design. The team shares its work with each other to get feedback and validate ideas/concepts in an early stage. Our designers always try to be on top of the latest design trends to make sure our designs are always up to date. The designers are distributed across LeasePlan to support several teams, we meet at least once a week to make sure we are all on the same page and to discuss design or challenges. What LeasePlan does To continue LeasePlan's success story in the fast-moving automotive industry, we are actively building our digital presence to create the "future of Digital" in the mobility industry, and to achieve our vision of "any car, anywhere, anytime". At LeasePlan Digital, our ambition is to create a customer-centric experience across all digital touchpoints to deliver true value to our customers and in turn maximize long-term customer satisfaction. What do we offer? A challenging job where you work on a product that is rolled out worldwide. Besides, it is an inspiring environment that is always in motion. We all work 100% from the comfort of our home. In the future, your workplace will be in a beautiful new office in Amsterdam and last but not least the opportunity to develop yourself in a growing international environment, with an appropriate salary and excellent secondary employment conditions. A pre-employment screening is part of the selection process.

title: Azure data engineer
summary: Je bent onderdeel van het programma Datagedreven Toezicht (circa 30 collega’s), dat bestaat uit een Data Insights team (data analisten + data scientisten) en…
description: Wat is vereist? WO werk- en denkniveau Minimaal 3 jaar relevante werkervaring Kennis van / ervaring met het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en beheren van ETL-processen Kennis van / ervaring met Microsoft SQL Server en Azure Cortana Intelligence Suite Goede beheersing Nederlandse taal, zowel in woord als geschrift Als visionair ben je enerzijds op zoek naar innovatieve middelen en anderzijds ken je het belang van een stabiele inrichting van dataverwerking Wat krijg je? €3.500 - €5.800 bruto p/m 36-urige werkweek 13e maand, 8,59% vakantietoeslag, bruto maandelijkse vergoeding van 5,6% 199,5 vakantie-uren per jaar (bovenop je standaard wekelijkse roostervrije dag) Bijdrage voor een abonnement bij een sportschool (aangesloten bij Bedrijfsfitness Nederland) De AFM heeft het “World-class Workplace!”-keurmerk: dit geeft aan dat medewerkers graag bij de AFM werken Wat doe je? 40% Development, testing en monitoring 20% Scrumsessies en kennisdelingen 40% DevOps- en DataOps-werkzaamheden  Als Azure data engineer bij de AFM ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontsluiten, structureren en prepareren van data. Je verwerkt data in het Managed Data Platform (MDP) van de AFM, dat bestaat uit verschillende databases voor domeinen zoals verzekeringen, pensioenen en beleggingsinstellingen. Jij richt deze (relationele) databases in, zorgt ervoor dat ze goed functioneren binnen de infrastructuur en maakt ze ‘gebruiksklaar’. Op deze manier kunnen toezichthouders en andere eindgebruikers meteen aan de slag met de data.  Daarnaast probeer je als technisch consultant de datakwaliteit binnen het MDP te verhogen, wat je alleen kunt realiseren als je de inhoud en betekenis van de data kent. Bovendien krijgt de AFM privacygevoelige data aangeleverd van interne en externe partijen, dus je houdt rekening met security-aspecten.  Verder verricht je DataOps- en DevOps-werkzaamheden, met als doel om changes op een geautomatiseerde manier zo snel en makkelijk mogelijk uit te rollen. Je werkt vooral met Microsoft Azure tools en programmeert ook in SQL, C# en Powershell.  Je bent onderdeel van het programma Datagedreven Toezicht (circa 30 collega’s), dat bestaat uit een Data Insights team (data analisten + data scientisten) en een platformteam. Jij bent onderdeel van dit laatste, samen met datamanagement specialisten, data engineers, data-infrastructuur specialisten, een solution architect en een security manager.  Als je het leuk vindt om je volledig onder te dompelen in data en hier secuur mee om te gaan, en je het een uitdaging vindt om je te verdiepen in de wondere (en complexe) wereld van Microsoft Azure, dan is dit een baan voor jou.  De AFM maakt zich sterk voor eerlijke en transparante financiële markten. De organisatie is gedragstoezichthouder van de gehele financiële marktsector: sparen, beleggen, verzekeren en lenen. Je vindt het kantoor van de AFM aan de Vijzelgracht in Amsterdam, waar ruim 650 hoogopgeleide professionals werken. De tramhalte en de metrohalte van de Noord-Zuidlijn zijn voor de deur; met het openbaar vervoer ben je binnen enkele stappen bij de AFM. Iedere collega is gedreven om een substantiële bijdrage te leveren aan het verbeteren van de financiële sector.  Om grip te houden op de financiële wereld is het noodzakelijk dat de AFM de markten goed kent om zo belangrijke risico’s te kunnen signaleren. Vervolgens moet daar slim op ingespeeld worden.  De AFM is trots op hun World-class Workplace!-keurmerk, dat aangeeft dat medewerkers bovengemiddeld graag bij de AFM werken. De score ligt boven de landelijke en sectorbenchmarks en is gebaseerd op zes elementen: werkgeverschap, organisatietrots, organisatierichting, waardering, werktrots en het benutten van talenten.  Hoofdkantoor in Amsterdam 50% / 50% Gem. leeftijd 42 jaar Tussen de 650 en 700 werknemers

title: Business Developer / Senior Digital Consultant Digital Water
summary:
Our team consist of business consultants, enterprise architect, GIS – and data engineering and data scientist.
Are you looking for the next step in your career?
description: Business Developer / Senior Digital Consultant Digital Water Are you looking for the next step in your career? Do you want to be part of the creation of a successful business in the digital industry space? The digital transformation in Water We are connecting the digital with the physical world at an ever-faster pace. In collaboration with our clients and partners, we use the latest digital technologies to translate data into insights and prospects. In this way we structurally support our clients in taking the next step in the continuous optimization and sustainability of their business operations. Our motto, also in the inevitable Digital Transformation: "Let's Enhance Society Together!" As a leading engineering firm in the water sector, Royal HaskoningDHV has been helping society manage water in all its aspects for more than 100 years. We continuously keep up with the major challenges that water management has. And we are proactive! For example, we’ve recognized at an early stage that digitization, IT and a data-driven approach have great potential to meet these challenges. Based on this determination, we have developed a wide range of digital services and products to support our clients in their digital transformation. This digital transformation is now in full swing and the need for this type of digital services and products we offer is growing rapidly.  The challenge Last year, Royal HaskoningDHV launched Royal HaskoningDHV Digital. Royal HaskoningDHV Digital deliver both digital consultancy services as well as software based on our deep domain knowledge (for example Aquasuite). The digital consultancy team consists of 120 employees in the Netherland, UK and Singapore. We provide both consultancy services related to digital transformation (like digital strategy, - implementation, enterprise architecture and data services like in depth training, data strategies and implementation) as well as the development of bespoke data solutions around domain specific areas like smart infrastructure, water & energy systems and climate. Our team consist of business consultants, enterprise architect, GIS – and data engineering and data scientist. As part of the growth strategy for this unit, we are looking to strengthen the team with a Business developer / senior digital consultant for the Water sector. This is a position characterized by a strong commercial flavour. You bear ultimate responsibility for the integrated sales funnel for our Digital Consultancy branch within the Water sector, with primary focus on development and delivery of impactful data solutions. Consider - for example - consultancy services in the domains Data Science / Machine Learning, Data Engineering, BIM, Digital Twins, Virtual and Augmented Reality, Internet of Things, Cloud technology, advanced GIS and Remote Sensing technology. But also, custom solutions in Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS or Esri Arcgis is in our scope. Core tasks of this role: To realize our growth ambition in the digital water market based on our data analytics tools and digital consultancy portfolio, with basic growth in the Netherlands and expansion in the United Kingdom. Define, in close alignment with the leadership of digital consultancy and other key players, priority areas, segments and value propositions to focus on in primarily the Dutch water market. Further refine value propositions that fit market needs and our capabilities, including validation in the market. Commercial activities including the position (with support of marketing) these services in the market, initiated and lead discussion with selected key clients and generate a portfolio of activities. Build relevant eco systems from a thought leadership, go to market and technology perspective. Lead where a propriate the execution of these projects as strategic advisor or project director. Participate and take active role in further definition and building of the team to enable future growth. What you bring? We are looking for a combination of relevant experience and competencies: You have at least 5-10 years of relevant experience in a sales or (commercial) business development role for (digital) consultancy. You are demonstrably skilled and effective in developing leads into concrete quotation requests. You are solidly grounded in bid management of larger / more complex quotation processes. You are a fast and effective networker with clear communication skills, both internally within the organization where you work, but especially in the market. You are strong in building and maintaining relationships with (potential) clients. You have demonstrably strong account management skills. You know the challenges in the water sector, both nationally and internationally. You have a network in the water sector. You are familiar with the digital themes of our digital services portfolio (f.e. data science, data engineering, GEO-ICT, dashboarding, software-development). You have an independent, pragmatic, result driven and proactive mindset. You are capable defining the operational, tactical and strategical challenges from our customers into concrete (software) solutions. You are a team player internally: you know how to motivate the colleagues you need to make the contribution that is needed. What we offer? We offer a great working atmosphere, short internal lines, within which collegiality and development of the organization and employees are the most important factors. We reward based on personal competences and the professional development opportunities are extensive. We combine this with an excellent package of flexible employment conditions and a good work-life balance such as flexible working hours and home working options. The procedure Are you our new Business Developer / Senior consultant Digital Water? We would like to meet you! Simply upload your CV and motivation letter via the application button. The procedure usually consists of two exploratory conversations (first via MS Teams) and an introduction to the team so that you get a good idea of where and with whom you are going to work. A capacity test can be part of the selection procedure. For more information, please contact [email protected]  Acquisition as a result of this vacancy is not appreciated #LI-DNI

title: Associate Scientist Release and Stability
summary: Review of documents such as assay run sheets (ARS) and laboratory notebooks in order to meet predefined data delivery timelines with expected quality.
description: Functie  The QCD labs group is part of the Analytical Development Department of the Pharmaceutical and Analytical Development sector. Overall, the QCD Labs unit consist of 6 sub-teams (Raw-Materials, Sample Management, Cell Culture, Microbiology, Coordination and Release & Stability) and is responsible for release and stability testing as well as the corresponding reporting of the company’s virus and antibody products for use in clinical trials and the analytical support of the pilot plant activities.  Your main tasks are: Review of documents such as assay run sheets (ARS) and laboratory notebooks in order to meet predefined data delivery timelines with expected quality.  Actively participate in setting up documents and or updating documents to ensure compliance.  Initiate and participate in continuous improvement projects that progresses the department in quality, EHS and efficiency.  Setting up and or keeping track of KPIs within the release and stability department.  Ensuring on time initiation and closure of deviations.  Functie eisen  Bachelor (HBO) degree level with minimal of 2 years cGMP experience in the Pharmaceutical industry.  Affinity and or experience with biological and or analytical assays.  Affinity with document related tasks will be considered as a pre.  You are motivated and have positive can-do attitude.  You have a good communication skills in English, written and spoken.  Communications skills in Dutch, will be considered as a plus.  This is a fulltime position (40 hours).  Aanbod  A great job opportunity at a worldwide operating company in the healthcare sector.  Sollicitatie Procedure  Contactpersoon voor deze functie is Joost Storms, bereikbaar op telefoonnummer 023 55 78 529 of via e-mail: joost@xdes.nl Kenmerk: 9806.

title: Senior Scientist Analytical Chemistry
summary:
Oversee a variety of analytical aspects including the meaning of analytical data from various sources.
What will your job be.
What are we looking for.
description: What will your job be In this role as Senior Scientist you will support the operations technical functions worldwide and resolve manufacturing or analytical issues for the products. Your focus will be on the planning and design of experiments as well as the interpretation and processing of the generated data.
