Daarnaast ondersteun je andere belangrijke stakeholders in het ziekenhuis, zoals zorgadministratie en interne projectleiders, met de implementatie van het DDD-Partnership in het ziekenhuis. Activiteiten Als Projectmanager identificeer je nieuwe doelmatigheidsparameters op basis van wet- en regelgeving, contractafspraken en signalen van de markt. In nauwe samenwerking met de Data Scientists van i2i ontwikkel je nieuwe analyses. Daarnaast fungeer je als coach voor je collega-projectmanagers. Door middel van je kennis en ervaring weet je collega’s te inspireren en biedt je hen handvatten om zich verder te kunnen ontwikkelen. Tevens ben je door je kennis van organisatorische en strategische vraagstukken een natuurlijke sparringspartner voor het management. In deze functie zul je ongeveer 70% van je tijd werkzaam zijn op het kantoor in Amsterdam en daarnaast ga je op locatie in gesprek met medisch specialisten. Kortom, een maatschappelijke relevante functie, waarin je jouw analytisch vermogen en projectmanagementvaardigheden kunt inzetten voor het verbeteren van de zorg. Aanbod maatschappelijk relevante functie op het snijvlak van inhoud en finance kans om jouw talent in te zetten om een bijdrage te leveren aan zinnige zorg stimulerende en inspirerende werkomgeving met veel externe contacten binnen zorginstellingen positief en bijzonder bedrijf met een hecht team waarin veel aandacht is voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling en groei. Vereisten Kwalificaties afgeronde M.Sc.-opleiding; aantoonbare uitgebreide kennis van en ervaring met het krachtenveld in de zorg (minimaal 5 jaar) zeer goede kennis van DBC-systematiek zelfstarter, gedreven om het DDD-Partnership verder uit te dragen sterke analytische, coachings- en projectmanagementvaardigheden persoonskenmerken: klantgericht, integer, overtuigend, strategisch kunnen opereren, oplossingsgericht, positief ingesteld en een teamspeler. Overig Wij hebben het ook wel over relatiemanager. Het is alleen niet de bedoeling dat je het product gaat verkopen, maar dat je op basis van de inhoud tot consensus komt over problemen en kansen.  Interesse? Neem contact op met Wietse Rypkema (06 – 50 74 65 47 / of via e-mail) Acquisitie door recruiters naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld

title: Systems-Module Architect
summary: Capable of working on diverse and broad problems where analysis of a situation or data requires an evaluation of variable factors.
description: Systems/Module Architect  The Team A part of the TEM Solutions R&D organization is the Manage Sample team. This team is committed to deliver cutting edge technologies related to sample manipulation (TEM stages are state of the art in all their aspects), Sample Transfer (loading and transport under room and cryogenic temperature conditions), Sample & System Conditioning (active vibration isolation systems, cryogenic systems for cooling etc.), sample stimulation (electrical, heating) etc. Next to this the team is responsible for the dynamic, mechatronic and thermal competences covering all parts of the TEM Solutions R&D organization. With the ongoing developments in physics and industry the requirements for Sample management are continuously growing. Aligning well with the Business Units, the Advanced Technology group and several collaborating partners this group is striving to convert the most promising technological concepts into real products for manipulating, transferring, conditioning and stimulating samples in and around the microscopes. The Manage Sample team is a global team with members in the city of Brno in Czech Republic and Eindhoven in the Netherlands. The Position As a Systems / Mechatronics Architect, you will work in a group of about 30 enthusiastic professionals that strive to continuously improve their next generation TEM products and workflows. You will work closely together with project managers, architects and technical experts from various technical backgrounds for optimal cross-functional alignment. You combine focus, technical vision and the ability to overview several complex projects in a cross-disciplinary setting. You will get a large influence not only at the start of the project by guiding conceptual designs and setting specifications but also by monitoring projects and motivating & inspiring engineers. You will report into the sample positioning competence owner. Specific responsibilities are: Creation of project definitions in a team with the product manager, project leader and specialists. Translation of market requirements into system requirements, system architecture, system design; and translation of them into function / module requirements. Setup of experiments to investigate detailed behavior of designs or their implementation in ThermoFisher Scientific systems. Lead the design teams implementing the specifications. Support, steer and motivate internal and external designers(suppliers). Optimization of system-level performance (resolution, quality, throughput, cost, …) during the initial phase of product development. Communication & documentation of own & teamwork, through presentations & reports. Drive for cost down and obsolescence removal and prevention. Manage medium-sized study projects, be technical lead product development projects. Responsible for maintaining up to date technical approach in a broad range of state‑of‑the‑art principles and practices relevant to the area of system architecture and system design. Fluent in English and preferably strong in local language. The Requirements You have a Masters/ PhD or equivalent in mechanical, mechatronics, electrical engineering, system/ motion control or a combination that shows the relevant expertise. You have professional experience in high tech mechatronic constructions with: Typically +7 years experience as technical lead role with proven track record of hardware- as well as software-focused design activities (from requirements to life cycle management). Advanced knowledge in mechanical, mechatronics, electrical engineering, system/ motion control or a combination that shows the relevant expertise, Within the area of expertise mastery of concepts, principals and practice is required. This knowledge is gained through deep involvement into the development of Electron Microscopes (or other relevant complex high-tech systems), combined with theoretical studies. Being recognized as an expert in his/her field. Capable of working on diverse and broad problems where analysis of a situation or data requires an evaluation of variable factors. Able to act independently by using judgment and thinking within broadly defined policies and objectives within the area of expertise/knowledge under general direction. Escalates to the next level in case of high-impact issues and/or complex problems. Capable of frequent and productive interactions with sr. management, supervisors and peers, on matters between functional areas, other company divisions or units, or customers and the company. Excellent skills in persuading, inspiring, developing and motivating are required in order to interact with other people. Competent in creating the right working climate because major accountabilities are achieved through teamwork with others. Advisor to staff- and senior scientists, staff- and senior engineers, project leaders, and senior managers, to resolve problems and/or meet schedules. Competencies The successful candidate will possess the following competencies: Functional: Strong analytical and strong conceptual thinking skills. Broad cross-disciplinary design experience Abstraction skills Creative “out of the box” solution finding skills Ability to create structure in a diverse multidisciplinary landscape of problems & opportunities Has a continuous drive for quality and performance improvement You have perseverance Business Obtain results Responsible to meet objectives Leadership Clear and open communication Good skills in persuading, inspiring and motivating others Achieving result through team spirit Self-steering Vision

title: Postdoc position for project “The impact of AI on knowledge work”
summary:
At the core of the methodology will be the interaction between designers, data scientists, domain experts, and managers.
We employ over 4,600 individuals.
description: Are you interested in studying how organizations can develop and implement AI solutions effectively and responsibly? Please apply for this postdoc position at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam’s KIN research group. Location: AMSTERDAM FTE: 1 Job description Artificial Intelligence (AI) based solutions are currently being developed and rolled out in organizations and are rapidly changing work. Being crucially different from prior ‘rule based’ expert systems, AI systems bring about novel risks and challenges for organizations and knowledge work. Their autonomous, self- learning capability and the ability to black-box knowledge raises fundamental questions, such as how can developers and users work together to ensure that AI solutions align - and stay aligned - with the use contexts? Yet, current debates on AI and work are primarily framed around its consequences for jobs, without empirically grounded research into both AI’s development and its implications for organizations and professionals.  This position is part of a larger NWO project “AI-Know” that aims to gain a deep understanding of how AI systems are developed and implemented; contribute to theories of technology’s role in knowledge, professional and organizational change, and ultimately develop an empirically-grounded methodology for ‘Collaborative AI’ that augments knowledge work. Your Duties As a postdoc researcher on the AI-Know project, you will collaborate with our NWO-funded PhD researchers, who conduct ethnographic research on the development, implementation and use of AI solutions in organizations. You will reflect and capitalize on findings from ongoing case studies at KIN, to gain a deeper understanding into processes of AI development and implementation, as well as the impact of AI on knowledge work. Based on ongoing insights, you will develop the methodology for ‘Collaborative AI’, thereby ultimately contributing to a human-centric digital society. At the core of the methodology will be the interaction between designers, data scientists, domain experts, and managers. You will publish your findings in top-tier academic journals preferably with a mutli-disciplinary audience and proactively disseminate the methodology that you will develop through education, executive programs, and workshops. Requirements earned PhD in business administration, (organizational) sociology or related social science discipline affinity with data-driven technologies and AI - able to unpack the “black box” of AI expertise in and affinity with qualitative research methods e.g. ethnography, interviews, and observations potential to establish a successful track record of publishing in high quality academic journals with a multidisciplinary audience evidence of successful collaboration with industry partners and active research valorization is an asset academic writing skills high proficiency of English language; Dutch language proficiency (or willingness to learn) preferred What are we offering? A challenging position in a socially involved organization. On full-time basis the remuneration amounts to a minimum gross monthly salary of € 3.491,- (scale 10) and a maximum €5.127 (scale 11), depending on your education and experience. The job profile: Onderzoeker 3 or 4 is based on the university job ranking system and is vacant for 1.0 FTE.  The appointment will be for 16 months, starting September 1st, 2021.  Additionally, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam offers excellent fringe benefits and various schemes and regulations to promote a good work/life balance, such as: a maximum of 41 days of annual leave based on full-time employment 8% holiday allowance and 8.3% end-of-year bonus solid pension scheme (ABP) contribution to commuting expenses optional model for designing a personalized benefits package  About Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam The ambition of Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is clear: to contribute to a better world through outstanding education and ground-breaking research. We strive to be a university where personal development and commitment to society play a leading role. A university where people from different disciplines and backgrounds collaborate to achieve innovations and to generate new knowledge. Our teaching and research encompass the entire spectrum of academic endeavour – from the humanities, the social sciences and the natural sciences through to the life sciences and the medical sciences.  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is home to more than 26,000 students. We employ over 4,600 individuals. The VU campus is easily accessible and located in the heart of Amsterdam’s Zuidas district, a truly inspiring environment for teaching and research.  Diversity We are an inclusive university community. Diversity is one of our most important values. We believe that engaging in international activities and welcoming students and staff from a wide variety of backgrounds enhances the quality of our education and research. We are always looking for people who can enrich our world with their own unique perspectives and experiences.  School of Business and Economics The School of Business and Economics (SBE) provides high-quality education and excellent research in business administration and economics with a focus on contributing to the social, economic and ecological challenges of our time. Whether it is the use of robots in society or big data, labour market participation or flexibility in the labour market, traffic jams or the housing market, flash crashes in the stock market or choice behaviour in gambling, leadership or change management: we believe in goal-oriented scientific research and understand that progress in academics, the business community and society is achieved through cooperation, openness and social responsibility.  At SBE, all of our highly-motivated colleagues work together closely in a stimulating, dynamic and international environment to achieve our collective goal of encouraging society to make informed choices. Approximately 4,200 Bachelor’s and Master’s students and 1,700 executive students are enrolled at the School, and employs roughly 500 people.  About KIN Center for Digital Innovation The KIN Center for Digital Innovation ( www.sbe.vu.nl/kin ) is a multi-disciplinary research institute on digital innovation and is part of the School of Business and Economics of the VU University of Amsterdam. We are an international group of 40 researchers studying the ways in which the use and development of digital innovations affect the way we work and organize. The group is very well connected to both the academic and private and public organizations. On top of delivering top quality teaching and research, the KIN Center for Digital Innovation is creating a platform for collaboration with private and public organizations, offering various forms of executive education, research collaboration and knowledge sharing sessions for business partners. Application Are you interested in this position? Please apply via the application button and upload your curriculum vitae including your publications, a personal vision statement (+/- 1 page) about research and teaching, and a cover letter until April 1, 2021. We start inviting candidates from now on and the search continues until the vacancy is filled with a high-quality candidate  Applications received by e-mail will not be processed.  Vacancy questions If you have any questions regarding this vacancy, you may contact:  Name: dr. Wendy Gunther Position: Researcher at KIN E-mail: w.a.gunther@vu.nl    No agencies

title: Senior Data Engineer – E-commerce – Rotterdam
summary:
You have been working as a data engineer for at least five years (preferable within an e-commerce environment).
The team uses a Agile way of working.
description: For a fast growing forward thinking E-commerce company in Rotterdam we are looking for an experienced Data Engineer. Together with a small team (7FTE) of Data Analysts en Data Scientists you will design and implement data integration flows into the DWH. Role You will be developing solutions around Big Data and UI-technologies. Using the full Hadoop Ecosystem (Hive, MapReduce, Spark etc.). Futhermore you will be programming in J2EE and Scala and managing and constructing NoSQL databases (Cassandra, Elasticsearch etc.). The team uses a Agile way of working. Essentials – You have been working as a data engineer for at least five years (preferable within an e-commerce environment) – You have extensive working experience using the Hadoop suite. – You have experience in programming with Java/Scala – You speak English fluently (understanding Dutch preferable) – You are a real problem-solver and teamplayer as well. They Offer – An informal way of working and great colleagues – Good salary (dependent on the experience) and excellent secundary benefits – A great spacious office – Lunch included – Growth possibilities (transparant)

title: Senior Process Analyst
summary: Measuring and analysing data or work with the data analysts/scientists to conduct data collection to support business cases for proposed solutions (focused on…
description: Senior process analysts are responsible for analysing and re-designing future proof and customer/user centric processes in our People department. They are responsible for responding to strategic priorities and proactively identifying opportunities to improve core HR processes to enable a better employee experience. This role provides support to the Product Team to implement process, data and systems solutions. Senior HR Process Analysts have knowledge of process mapping and business process redesign. They analyse business processes and workflows and conduct measurement and analysis to test assumptions with the objective of finding out how they can be improved or automated. You will have a highly data driven approach in your analysis and combine this with a passion for technology to automate and streamline high volume processes. You will be coaching and guiding junior and medior process analysts. As a senior process analyst you overlook multiple projects and disciplines at the same time. You are able to present progress updates and final outcomes to senior management. You are building a network with your business partners to identify new opportunities to support the business with the teams experience on process excellence. B.Responsible Proactively identifying opportunities to improve core HR process Coach and guide junior and medior Process Analysts Mapping and analysing existing processes Identifying gaps, assessing requirements and impact and propose quick fixes as well as long term solutions Gathering requirements (E.g. technical, business, country specific..) Designing globally scalable and locally relevant processes with a customer-centric mindset Facilitating and leading current and future state process / data /stakeholders and accountability mapping and analysis sessions Defining new process designs to stakeholders for discussion. Ensuring HR Processes are compliant and in line with company policies Support Product Team in measuring new processes effectiveness Measuring and analysing data or work with the data analysts/scientists to conduct data collection to support business cases for proposed solutions (focused on increased productivity, reduced cost and improved employee experience) Engaging the Change and Implementation managers to ensure a smooth landing of the changes and that all relevant stakeholders are trained B.Requirements 5-7 years’ experience in supporting business driven solutions End to end ownership on team projects leading to organisational, procedural & technical changes to improve performance in the people department Proactively suggest improvement areas to management where Process Analysts can make the biggest impact Create Data Driven Business Cases, Process flows, User Stories, Acceptance criteria etc. Collaboratives closely with all relevant teams to ensure effective delivery of projects with quality. Initiate organisational, procedural & technical changes to improve performance. Reports status, set milestones, identify issues and risks to project progress to sr management. Proven ability to influence and drive results on a global scale Possess critical thinking skills to translate People department strategy into project delivery Agile and innovative with the tenacity to thrive in a constantly changing environment Familiar with design thinking Project management skills Very high problem solving and structuring skills, with ability to simplify complex areas Flexible and capable to find the right balance between structured problem analysis and project management and agility to deal with B.com fast-pace change environment Good communicator (on several levels) and ability to work with, influence and align with multiple stakeholders

title: MLOPS Engineer
summary: We connect software/data engineers, cloud engineers, and data scientists with the most interesting data-driven companies in the Netherlands.
description: MLOPS Engineer (includes a one-year advanced-training program)  Are you ready to accelerate your Machine Learning career? Xccelerated combines advanced, hands-on training with real-world work at one of our partner companies—like Heineken, Randstad Group, Vattenfall, or Pathé. After our 13-month program, you have the opportunity to join the company directly.  Who are we? We are Xccelerated, a proud part of Xebia Group. We prepare professionals (with a minimum of one-year relevant work experience) to become authorities in their fields. We connect software/data engineers, cloud engineers, and data scientists with the most interesting data-driven companies in the Netherlands. We provide the opportunity to develop your skills further through challenging, real-world work experience and advanced, hands-on training.     Who are you? Are you a data scientist/ML engineer with at least one year of relevant work experience and do you know statistics and possess the programming skills to build machine learning models? Then you’ve already got a fantastic foundation for developing further and future-proofing your career.  If you have: A relevant master’s degree (e.g. artificial intelligence, business analytics, econometrics); One-year-minimum work experience as a data scientist/ML engineer at a company The willingness to learn and interest in working at one of our partner companies A passion for programming, preferably in Python.  Then let’s talk!  What’s the program like? The Xccelerated program kicks off with a month-long, full-time bootcamp training. Here, we focus on writing deployable code, version control, continuous integration, working with Docker and cloud computing, A/B testing, deploying model artefacts, and monitoring your models in production. Some topics may sound familiar, but we’ll go more in depth into principles and best practices to prepare you for the next step in your career.  After the bootcamp, you’ll spend a full year working on-site four days a week at one of our partner companies and returning one day a week to our Xccelerated office in Amsterdam. During these “return” days, you split your time between theory and practice—gaining project guidance and coaching from our supervising consultants to support you in the partner company’s projects, while also diving deeper into training topics not covered in the bootcamp. It’s always about continuous learning. Besides the technical aspect, we’ll focus on your personal development as well.  Interested? Great! We’d love to meet you! Please get in touch! Contact Jessie Loogman at jloogman@xccelerated.io or by phone at +31650999663.Our next Machine Learning Engineering group starts on August, 2021!  https://www.xccelerated.io

title: Platform Engineer
summary:
We at Xebia IT Architects enjoy great success in enabling data scientists at companies to become data-driven.
If you know your way around the big-data ecosystem…
description: At Xebia we are always looking for talented people to deliver value to our clients and their customers. We help our customers to become data-driven by building their self-service data-platform in the cloud and therefore deliver direct value to their clients. We at Xebia IT Architects enjoy great success in enabling data scientists at companies to become data-driven. Just think of what more we can achieve when YOU join our team!  As a Data Platform Engineer, you are responsible for the setup, deployment, and productionising of data-intensive environments. You develop infrastructure as code that will support the setup of the self-service data platform. You are able to do this in at least one of the major cloud providers. You are experienced in architecting “simple” solutions and have a background in software engineering. Within your work, automating everything is written in your DNA.  What will you do? With your knowledge of infrastructure, cloud, clusters, queues, containers, streaming, and graphs you work on business-critical systems with lots of data or help build such systems greenfield. You work at the client in mixed teams, and pick up the work that is related to the platform which the team is building. When you're working on-site with a client you may come across something that is really difficult to solve. Luckily, every other week Xebians gather at our office to share knowledge with each other, to discuss and even solve challenges with the help of the hive mind of Xebia. If that's too long to wait, everybody at Xebia is just a quick message away and ready to help at any time.  Why this job? if you really like working with the latest and greatest cloud solutions from AWS, GCP or Azure if you know your way around the big-data ecosystem and work with tools like Airflow and Spark if you get energy from working for different clients and helping them achieve their goals if you like working with open-source technology and want to make time to contribute to the communities  And you are: Experienced as an Cloud Engineer or Data Platform Engineer Someone who enjoys ‘walking on the edge,’ and is eager to work with new technologies Enjoys spreading knowledge and training organisations in how to become high performing SRE players Inspiring Knowledgeable with a touch of geekiness Not ashamed to talk about your ambition in your field of expertise We’d love to hear from you! We’re all about helping people boost their careers and contribute in a meaningful way in their work.  Sounds good? There’s more:  Challenging projects with a steep learning curve Regular in-house knowledge sharing sessions and support for professional and personal development A cool, inspiring office and creative workplace Great parties and social/sports activities At Xebia, you’ll find like-minded colleagues who are frontrunners in their fields. We’re ambitious, experienced professionals in business and IT, specialized in connecting people, technology and data. We are always searching for talent—are you in?

title: Senior/Scientist Clinical Bioanalysis
summary:
Genmab A/S is committed to protecting your personal data and privacy.
Please see our privacy policy for handling your data in connection with you application on…
description: Genmab is focused on the creation and development of innovative and differentiated antibody products, with the aim of improving the lives of cancer patients. Role The Bioanalytical Science team develops bioanalytical strategies to support the pre-clinical and clinical development of Genmab’s formats and compounds. We design, execute, interpret, and validate bioanalytical methods (Pharmacokinetic, Pharmacodynamic and Immunogenicity assays) and perform bioanalysis activities for both regulated (GLP, GCP) and non-regulated (mouse studies, exploratory toxicology, and dose range finding) studies. As such, we provide a strong foundation for informed decision-making at critical points throughout our entire drug development program. As a (Senior) Scientist Clinical Bioanalysis within the Bioanalytical Science team, you will mainly work on compounds in early and late clinical development stages. You will be part of the cross-organization Compound Development Team for several programs, and be responsible for the bioanalytical method strategy, mainly focusing on specific PK and binding ADA (bADA) methods, neutralizing anti-drug antibodies (NAb), and biomarkers. You will supervise the development of assays used by internal and external parties such as Contract Research Organizations (CROs) and will work closely together with a team of Research Associates to develop and qualify assays for clinical trials enabling registration of new therapeutic products. To achieve this, you keep yourself up to date with the latest developments in the field, such as novel technologies and regulatory requirements within the bioanalytical sector. In addition, you will collaborate with CROs, transfer methods, write protocols and record scientific results in publications, regulatory documents, product development records and patents. Responsibilities Validation of large molecule assays to measure pharmacokinetic (PK), anti-drug antibody (ADA) and neutralizing antibody (NAb) responses in biological matrices (these methods are used in support of Genmab’s clinical trials). Take responsibility for bioanalysis within multi-disciplinary project teams. Author necessary documentation and transfer methods to external parties (CROs). Ensure compliance with regulations, i.e. GXP, FDA, EMA, and ICH regulations. Act as a primary contact for external parties (validation, managing timelines, troubleshooting, analysis, etc.). Keep the department up to date with the latest relevant scientific information regarding immunology, cell-based assays, and regulatory documents. Requirements You have a finished PhD degree and at least two years relevant experience in bioanalytical method development and validation. Alternatively, you hold a MSc degree with at least 5 years relevant experience in bioanalytical method development and validation. You have a proven track record in the development and troubleshooting of immunological and cell-based assays. You have experience in method development to evaluate unwanted immunogenicity. You have experience with regulatory bioanalysis and knowledge of relevant guidance documents as well as GLP/GCP. You are flexible, well-organized and can lead several projects at once, and you are able to work to tight deadlines. You have experience in managing Contract Research Organizations. You have excellent relational and communication skills in English (Dutch is an advantage, but not required). In case you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to Recruiter Mark Stickland at ext-fts-mst@genmab.com Genmab employees work with determination and with respect for each other, consistent with our core values, to achieve our common goals. We give individuals and teams the autonomy to drive development of innovative products and solutions, knowing that integrity is a core value throughout our company. Genmab will offer the successful application a challenging position, where the right candidate will have the opportunity to work with highly specialised people across functions in an informal, multicultural culture, all aiming to make a difference for cancer patients.  Teamwork and respect are central pillars of Genmab’s culture and we therefore ensure an inclusive, open, and supportive professional work environment across our international locations. We believe that fostering workplace diversity across social, educational, cultural, national, age and gender lines is a prerequisite for the continued success of the company. We are committed to diversity at all levels of the company and strive to recruit employees with the right skills and competences, regardless of gender, age, ethnicity, etc. Please note that if you are applying for a position in the Netherlands; Genmab’s policy for all permanently budgeted hires in this location is to offer a temporary agreement for one year, followed by a contract for indefinite time regardless of seniority. Genmab A/S is committed to protecting your personal data and privacy. Please see our privacy policy for handling your data in connection with you application on our website https://www.genmab.com/privacy .

title: Sr. Manager IT Business Partner – BI, Insights, & Analytics
summary: Ability to work independently, prioritize within an interdisciplinary environment that includes (data) scientists, engineers, business stakeholders, and…
description: Job Description Summary The role of Sr. Manager IT Business Partner – BI, Insights, & Analytics for the Central Team is to serve as the business partner for the Integrated Supply Chain data analytics team. This individual will have in-depth knowledge of Technology, BI, and Innovation solution offerings that are available to TGS' internal customers and will partner with the Integrated Supply Chain to ensure that all their reporting and analytics requirements are delivered through these solutions. This individual will be responsible for continually identifying opportunities and driving the continuous improvement mindset that may come from the application of TGS' solutions through the core areas of delivery, solutions team.  This individual will interface with business partners, TGS' solution platform team and external experts as they design and shape solutions that create value for our stakeholders. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who loves technology and process challenges and has BI, Analytics and Innovation drive with a mindset to create an impact.  This position reports directly to the TGS Central Teams Integrated Supply Chain Business Partner Lead and will serve on the leadership team of Business Partner Integrated Supply Chain. Job Description Primary responsibilities will include: Develop in-depth knowledge of TGS' core areas of delivery and become a subject matter expert on TGS' offerings and capabilities specifically in application technology and platforms related to BI, Analytics and Insights Understand and enhance the Integrated Supply Chain Business Intelligence and Innovation capability roadmaps by architecting appropriate solutions that enable growth and operational excellence Drive the continuous improvement mindset across the business partner organization and partner with integrated supply chain business team to activate this in a way that captures value for BDX Lead solution workshops and discovery sessions for data analytics to recommend the best-fit solutions for the Integrated Supply Chain Build a capability to leverage TGS's analytic services to provide data insights and business intelligence for Integrated Supply Chain Work with TGS Business Partners and TGS' Solution Platform team to ensure that solutions are scalable and that they are informed by, and are integrated with, BD's enterprise roadmaps Ensure that all designed solutions meet the desired outcomes, deliver projects, managing multiple 3rd party vendors and solution providers. Serve as a continuous connector. Energized by a role that focuses on partnership and facilitation. Operates through the lens of what can we do to simplify and improve things Provide subject matter expertise for high priority data related incidents. Act as advisor and support the TGS ISC business partner for the data analytics needs. The ideal candidate will bring a combination of strategic understanding, technology and process improvement experience, solution engineering skills, and the ability to communicate together. Besides, this person should also possess: 10+ years of relevant experience in a technology or process organization Experience with major ERP solutions (e.g., SAP, JD Edwards, etc.), data lake, control tower, and analytical platform and data tools Broad understanding of processes, technology and data across multiple functional disciplines with Integrated Supply Chain (i.e., Procurement, Logistics, EHS, Planning finance, Manufacturing, etc.) Understanding of the use of AI/ML in the business context Partner with delivery team to experiment and create prototypes and proofs of values to showcase the potential and limitations of a solution, both from a functional perspective, but also in terms of scalability, robustness, and return on investment Experience with Statistics, Data Mining, Machine Learning, Data Visualization, Function Coding, Cloud Computing, Distributed Systems. Demonstrated end-to-end business process thinking Ability to work independently, prioritize within an interdisciplinary environment that includes (data) scientists, engineers, business stakeholders, and consultants Ability to facilitate solution discovery, blueprint outcomes and lead multiple improvement efforts keeping service and customer-oriented mindset Skilled at working with domain experts in the fields of technology, data and analytics, and business processes Ability to influence and break down silos within an organization as well across organizations Ability to communicate complex business / technical challenges in a simplified manner Ability to influence stakeholders in written and oral communications Exceptional ability to lead change using positive and collaborative methods Highly collaborative work style which includes working effectively across all organizational levels Experience working in a highly matrixed organization and in overcoming ambiguity Leading by example, mentoring, and motivating others all around you Deep analytical, evaluative, and problem-solving abilities Excellent judgment and decision-making Able to align and work with diverse global stakeholders Strong humility, listening, creativity, and negotiation skills A real team player with experience working in large and small teams Accept ownership Becton, Dickinson and Company is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. We do not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, age, sex, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, marital or domestic or civil union status, familial status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetics, disability, military eligibility or veteran status, or any other protected status. #LI-PRO Primary Work Location USA NJ - Franklin Lakes

title: WO Traineeship Overheid richting Data Analytics in omgeving Arnhem
summary: Tijdens het data analytics traineeship ga jij als junior data analist data driven werken om de goudklompjes aan informatie in big data op te sporen.
description: Wil jij als Dagobert Duck duiken in grote bakken met (big) data? En kom jij graag achter jouw computer vandaan om anderen enthousiast te maken met de vondsten uit jouw data analyse? Dan is deze data analytics vacature echt wat voor jou! Wist jij dat het beroep data analist valt onder zeer goed betaalde banen tegenwoordig? Twijfel niet langer en ga aan de slag als WO Trainee Data Analytics in omgeving Arnhem! Als trainee data analytics volg je de opleiding (traineeship) Business Analytics & Data Science. Wat ga je doen tijdens het WO traineeship Overheid richting Data Analytics in omgeving Arnhem? Big data is hot and happening. Zo kun je middels data analyse, big data inzetten om voorspellingen te doen waar criminaliteit plaats gaat vinden. Of kun je voorspellen welke behandeling het beste aan zal sluiten bij een specifieke patiënt met Alzheimer. De mogelijkheden met big data zijn eindeloos, en jij kunt als trainee werken met passie aan inzichten die een impact maken. Ook in de big data van organisaties ligt veel waardevolle informatie verborgen. Veel van deze data blijft tot op heden vaak onbenut. Tijdens het data analytics traineeship ga jij als junior data analist data driven werken om de goudklompjes aan informatie in big data op te sporen. De inzichten die middels data analyse hebt vergaard, weet je te vertalen naar iets bruikbaars en tastbaars. Vervolgens trek jij als junior data analist met grote enthousiasme de organisatie in om jouw resultaten, die je geanalyseerd hebt, onder de aandacht te brengen. Wat bieden we jou? Naast een goed betaalde baan op WO niveau, bieden we je natuurlijk ook meer: Een vast contract (ja, écht!) Werken en leren (praktische ervaring en meer theoretische kennis) Specialiseren tot professional op het gebied van Business Analytics & Data Science middels een data analist opleiding. Na afloop van het traineeship ligt er een goede baan aan jouw voeten. Een opleiding op post-master niveau op het gebied van Business Analytics & Data Science, gegeven door hoogleraren van de VU Amsterdam en Data Science Alkmaar Klas vol vakidioten waar je lekker mee kunt sparren en werken met passie. Leerzame kennissessies die ervoor zorgen dat jij up to date bent in het vakgebied data science en data analytics. Cv tips om je voor te bereiden op de beste werkgever Uitdagend werk bij verschillende toffe opdrachtgevers. Neem een kijkje in de keuken bij meerdere organisaties zodat je ontdekt waar jouw passies liggen Een groot aanbod aan opdrachten bij overheid, luchtvaartmaatschappijen, marketingorganisaties en NGO’s Coaching voor snellere persoonlijke ontwikkeling Een groot netwerk van professionals waar jij op terug kunt vallen Praktische cursussen gegeven door een senior data scientist in Machine Learning, Python, R, SQL, textmining, data visualisatie en dergelijke Scrum Master training Wat vragen wij? Jij wordt blij van puzzelen in grote hoeveelheden big data en weet de juiste informatie daar uit te halen. Je bent analytisch, communicatief vaardig en ondernemend. Ook beschik je over enthousiasme en overtuigingskracht zodat de organisatie echt wat met jouw resultaten gaat doen. Daarnaast: Heb je een afgeronde WO-opleiding met een kwantitatief karakter, bijvoorbeeld in de richting van Economie, Econometrie, een Research Master, Neuroscience, Psychologie, Biomedische wetenschappen of Earth Science. Beschik je over uitstekende kennis op het gebied van toegepast onderzoek, data analytics, wiskunde en statistiek Heb je stage gelopen en praktische ervaring opgedaan met data analyse. Heb je gewerkt met tools zoals Power BI, Tableau, SQL, Stata, Matlab, GIS, Python, R of vergelijkbaar. Ben je in het bezit van een rijbewijs B. Beschik je over uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal Wat kan trainee.nl voor jou betekenen? Jij, generatie Spicegirl of Backstreetboy, hebt je WO opleiding afgerond. Nu ben je op zoek naar de perfecte baan en een vliegende start van je carrière. Dat is precies waar wij van trainee.nl gespecialiseerd in zijn. Daarnaast werken we landelijk, dus ook bij jou in de buurt! Tijdens ons gesprek leren we jou kennen zodat we weten wat jouw droombaan is. Trainee.nl zet zich in om deze droombaan voor jou te bemachtigen. Wij zorgen dat je niet tussen de eindeloze stapel CV’s van concurrenten komt te liggen, maar krijgen jou direct aan tafel bij de juiste persoon binnen de organisatie. En ben jij bang je sollicitatiegesprek bij de opdrachtgever van je dromen te verpesten? Geen nood, wij pimpen jouw CV in een mooi CV template en gaan met jou mee op sollicitatiegesprek. Vooraf krijg je ook een sollicitatietraining met sollicitatie tips en oefenen wij jouw sollicitatie pitch zodat je gaat vlammen tijdens het gesprek. Trainee.nl is open, nuchter en sociaal. Dat komt waarschijnlijk omdat we op kantoor werken met passie, enthousiast en gedreven zijn. Regelmatig zoeken we elkaar op voor borrels en andere leuke uitjes. Wil jij binnenkort mee met een van onze vele personeelsuitjes? Solliciteer dan vandaag nog! Zit jij nog op het puntje van je stoel? Om onze kwaliteit hoog te houden hebben we een beperkt aantal trainee plaatsen beschikbaar. Gelukkig hebben wij een plekje voor jou gereserveerd! Reageer nu snel op onze vacature. Wil je meer informatie over deze vacature neem dan vrijblijvend contact op met Daniëlle Swets. Stuur een mail naar danielle@trainee.nl of bel naar 06-20662841. De meest gestelde vragen zijn hier terug vinden. Werken met Passie| Big Data | Data Science| Traineeship | Master Data Management | Trainee | CV Template | Sollicitatie Pitch | Junior Data Scientist | Data Traineeship | Traineeship Overheid | Data Opleiding |WO traineeship | Scrum Master Training | Vacature Junior Data Analist | Data Analytics | goed betaalde banen Solliciteren Delen: Terug naar het overzicht

title: Senior Data Scientist
summary:
Gespreks- en sparringpartner zijn voor collega data scientists, analisten en hoger management.
Herkennen van noodzakelijke samenwerkingen en deze data…
description: Los jij graag datavraagstukken op die gericht zijn op de toekomst van jouw eigen leefomgeving? Wil jij met collega's en externe partners samenwerken om grote hoeveelheden data om te zetten naar bruikbare informatie? Vindt je het tot slot leuk om met je collega's te sparren en projectmatig bezig te zijn? Lees dan snel verder. ISDR46851 Organisatie Als Data Scientist bij deze organisatie zul jij je geen moment vervelen. Ze zijn gevestigd in de omgeving van Haarlem en binnen de organisatie ga je aan de slag met diverse projecten en overheidsvraagstukken. Deze organisatie werkt nauw samen met toonaangevende onderzoeksinstituten binnen Nederland. Als onderdeel van een team van enthousiaste en gedreven data scientists en analisten ga je de uitdaging aan om met verschillende partijen uiteenlopende opgaven te realiseren. De afgelopen jaren is er op datagebied aan projecten gewerkt die een grote impact hebben op de huidige maatschappij en ruimtelijke ordening. Denk hierbij aan maatschappelijke organisaties, maar ook aan projecten voor overheden en kennisinstellingen. Eén van de vraagstukken voor de komende periode is bijvoorbeeld de stad van de toekomst. Werk jij hier binnenkort aan mee? Er liggen nog tal van andere dataprojecten op de stapel waar je de komende jaren vol enthousiasme en trots aan kan werken. Er is dan ook nog genoeg ruimte voor nieuwe ideeën. De sfeer binnen de organisatie valt het best te omschrijven als informeel en professioneel. Kortom: je krijgt uitgebreid de kans om te werken aan gave / innovatieve projecten en daarnaast zijn er voldoende opleidingsmogelijkheden om jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen. Taken Identificeren van datavraagstukken Herkennen van noodzakelijke samenwerkingen en deze data combineren ten einde data analyses uit te voeren Omzetten van businessvragen naar dataprojecten Herkennen en inspelen op verbeteringen op het gebied van diepte en omvang Gespreks- en sparringpartner zijn voor collega data scientists, analisten en hoger management Creëeren van draagvlak op zowel operationeel als strategisch niveau. Eisen HBO/WO werk -en denkniveau. Bij voorkeur afgestudeerd in bijvoorbeeld data science, econometrie, bedrijfskunde of engineering. Meer dan 5 jaar ervaring in data-analyse en modellering. Meer dan 5 jaar ervaring met programmeertalen als Python, C++, Spark Scala, Java. Ervaring in zowel gestructureerde als ongestructureerde datatools, zoals SQL of Hadoop. Bekwaam met statistical packages en Machine Learning. Kennis van data analytics platforms en cloudomgevingen is ene pré. Sterke communicatieve- en presentatievaardigheden. Je bent gedreven en enthousiast. Arbeidsvoorwaarden Salaris oplopend tot 6150 euro o.b.v. 36 uur. 36-urige werkweek Goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden, waaronder volledige OV vergoeding Prima balans tussen werk -en privé. Salarisindicatie De salarisindicatie bedraagt 4.300 euro tot 6.150 euro bruto per maand op basis van 36 uur per week. Over iSense iSense is een jonge, energieke en ambitieuze specialist in de ICT arbeidsbemiddeling. iSense helpt je bij het vinden van een baan op operatie, business consultancy en (project/lijn) management niveau. Een baan waarin je succesvol kunt zijn en vooral ook gelukkig. Samenwerken met iSense betekent voor jou: Persoonlijke begeleiding voor, tijdens en na jouw sollicitatietraject; Goed inzicht in jouw persoonlijke vaardigheden door diverse rapportages; Klaargestoomd worden voor jouw sollicitatiegesprek; Altijd op de hoogte zijn van jouw sollicitatietraject; Maandelijks persoonlijk contact met de Field Coach; Ieder kwartaal gratis deelnemen aan de Personal Development Workshops; Met regelmaat op pad met jouw iSense collega’s in de regio (ihavefun). Meer weten? Kijk op www.iSense.nl. Locatie Haarlem Publicatiedatum 23.12.2020 Publicatie eindigt 29.04.2021

title: Analist Biochemie
description: Analist Biochemie Location: Leiden, South Holland Contact: Nicol Heijtbrink Job type: Permanent Contact phone: +31 (0)20 406 97 50 Industry: Pharmaceutical , Life Sciences, Clinical Research, Contract Testing Labs Contact email: nicol_heijtbrink@oxfordcorp.com Ben jij op zoek naar de volgende stap in je carrière? We zijn op zoek naar biochemisch analisten ten behoeve van kwaliteitscontrole op farmaceutische producten. Heb je ervaring met ELISA, PCR, HPLC en andere biochemische laboratoriumtechnieken, solliciteer dan direct!  Functieomschrijving Voor het biochemisch QC-laboratorium van een van onze opdrachtgevers zoeken wij een analist die zich bezighoudt met de analyse van farmaceutische producten zoals eiwitten, antilichamen en vaccins. Je zult werken met diverse gespecialiseerde assays. (o.a. ELISA, SDS, SEC, TOC, Karl fisher, HPLC / UPLC). Verantwoordelijkheden Hands-on laboratorium assays uitvoeren volgens vaststaande protocollen; Analyse van verkregen analytische data; Werken en rapporteren volgens GMP-richtlijnen; Meedenken in verbeterprocessen op het laboratorium Profiel Afgeronde opleiding in een biochemische richting; Werkervaring onder GMP is een grote pre; Je houdt van aanpakken en voert graag analyses uit middels ELISA, HPLC en andere technieken; Ervaring met het interpreteren van data; Aantoonbare ervaring met biochemische assays; Je hebt een achtergrond in de immunologie; Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift; Goede communicatieve vaardigheden; Arbeidsvoorwaarden Dienstverband: detachering via Oxford Global Resources Salarisindicatie: van €2000,- tot €3000,- bruto per maand naar gelang van ervaring Werktijden: full time 40 uur per week, in dagdienst; Vakantiedagen: 25; Standplaats: Regio Leiden Vacaturenummer: 15799 Oxford Global Resources is het grootste recruitmentbureau binnen de vakgebieden Science, Engineering en IT. Al onze recruiters hebben zelf een relevante achtergrond binnen deze gebieden en helpen je graag bij het vinden van de perfecte baan in ons uitgebreide netwerk. Als gespecialiseerde partij hebben wij een groot aanbod aan laboratorium vacatures op het gebied van Quality Control (QC) en Research &Development (R&D) binnen diverse sectoren, waaronder de Farmaceutische industrie, Biotechnologie, Contract Manufacturing, Contract Research, Voedingsmiddelenindustrie, Chemie, Milieu en Plantensector. Oxford is altijd op zoek naar talent met expertise op het gebied van Biotechnologie, Immunologie, Biochemie, Virologie, Microbiologie, Moleculaire Biologie, Life Science, Analytische Chemie, Fysische Chemie, Polymeerchemie, Petrochemie en Diagnostiek. Wij komen graag in contact met kandidaten die ervaring hebben met een of meerdere van de volgende technieken: USP (Upstream Processing) DSP (Downstream Processing), Bioprocesses, viruskweek, celkweek, ELISA, FACS, Western Blot, SDS-page, PCR, RT-PCR, qPCR, kloneren, sequencing, eiwit zuivering, purificatie, HPLC, UPLC, chromatografie, fysische chemie, viscositeit, smeltpunt, pourpoint, pH, XRF, GC, GC-MS, LC, LC-MS, ICP ICP-MS, AAS, UV, titraties, Karl Fisher, formuleren, steriliteit, determinaties, bioburden, environmental monitoring, LIMS, GMP, GLP, GCP, GDP, ISO17025. Vind je deze vacature interessant? Of ben jij op zoek naar een functie op MLO, HLO, BSc, WO, MSc of PhD en heb je interesse in de vacature laboratorium Assistent, Laborant, Laborant monstervoorbereiding, Analist, Technician, Assistant Scientist, Associate Scientist, Scientist, Manufacturing Specialist, Process Engineer, Validatie Engineer, QA (Quality Assurance) Officer, RA (Regulatory Affairs) Officer, Supervisor, Teamleider, Afdelingshoofd, Hoofd Laboratorium, Manager, Director, etc. Neem dan direct contact met ons op! Apply Now

title: Data Scientist
summary:
Je weet als geen ander data te analyseren en aan bedrijfsprocessen te koppelen.
Als Data Scientist ga je aan de slag met big data van de opdrachtgever.
description: Jij weet als geen ander wat de toekomst gaat brengen. Sterker nog, jij weet dit al tijden. Met behulp van big data analyseer en voorspel jij wat klanten doen en met zelfvertrouwen presenteer je jouw bevindingen aan de business. Jij bent klaar voor de volgende stap in je carrière? Dan opent Brunel voor jou de deuren van toonaangevende organisaties. Over deze functie Als Data Scientist ga je aan de slag met big data van de opdrachtgever. Je weet als geen ander data te analyseren en aan bedrijfsprocessen te koppelen. Je bent in staat complexe vraagstukken terug te brengen naar data-analyse en komt met verbetervoorstellen voor het bedrijfsproces en het verhogen van de ROMI. Op multidisciplinair niveau de eindjes aan elkaar knopen is iets waar je goed in bent. Je hebt een enorme passie voor Big Data en alle mogelijkheden die dit met zich meebrengt. Binnen de functie kom je tot insights die het gedrag van de klant voorspellen. Daarbij adviseer je en lever je een bijdrage aan het verder ontwikkelen van de data-afdeling. Je zet nieuwe, innovatieve trajecten op waarbij je business- en marketingdoelstellingen zeker niet uit het oog verliest. Vervolgens leg je jouw plannen voor aan het hoger management en overtuig je hen van het succes dat ze ermee kunnen behalen. Over jou Wil jij werk maken van jouw Marketing-/IT-carrière bij Brunel? Dan heb je: Minimaal een afgeronde hbo-opleiding richting informatica, wiskunde, statistiek of econometrie Ruime ervaring met big data-concepten en technologieën zoals datamining en machine learning, SQL, MapReduce, NoSQL en Hadoop Ervaring met programeertalen als Java, Python, Scala, JavaScript. Ervaring met het vertalen van data naar insights voor effectieve verbetrvoorstellen en het oplossen van complexe uitdagingen  Wat wij bieden Als Data Scientist gedetacheerd worden door Brunel Marketing & Communicatie of IT betekent dat je in dienst treedt bij Brunel. Bij Brunel staat jouw loopbaan voorop. Je kunt bij ons rekenen op: Flexibiliteit en de zekerheid van een vast contract Volop ruimte om je als specialist – in de breedte en in de diepte – verder te ontwikkelen Een op maat gemaakt opleidingsprogramma Begeleiding bij elk project. Waar je ook bent, je hebt een vast aanspreekpunt bij Brunel Een gunstige pensioenregeling. Zodat het nu goed met je gaat, en later ook Collectiviteitskortingen op individuele verzekeringen Leuke extra’s op cultureel en sportief gebied. Er is meer dan werk alleen Kortom, bij Brunel kun jij je dromen en ambities waar maken en je carrière een boost geven  Over ons Brunel is wereldwijd zakelijk dienstverlener, gespecialiseerd in projectmanagement, detachering en consultancy. We verlenen onze diensten binnen de vakgebieden Marketing & Communicatie, Engineering, IT, Finance & Risk, HR, Legal, HR, Healthcare en alle disciplines in de olie- en gasindustrie. Dit doen we samen met 14.500 collega’s vanuit 44 landen. En we doen dit met focus. Want bij Brunel geloven we erin dat als je ergens 100% voor gaat, dat je daar het allerbeste in kan worden. Brunel Marketing & Communicatie is een van de businesslines van Brunel. De MarCom-consultants houden zich bezig met het uitgebreide project- en vacatureportfolio van opdrachtgevers. Deze gerenommeerde opdrachtgevers bevinden zich in de meest uiteenlopende branches. Van FMCG tot banken en verzekeraars, en van industrie tot energie en telecom. Wij onderhouden hechte relaties met onze opdrachtgevers, zodat we weten wat er speelt en wat de perspectieven zijn. Wat zeg je ervan? Zet jij de stap naar Brunel? Dan openen wij de deuren voor jou bij toonaangevende organisaties. Solliciteer nu.  HBO

title: PhD positions Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning for Medical Imaging
summary: Your role is to develop AI methods that go beyond the data-driven principle and actively integrate the imaging physics of data (e.g. MRI, CT).
description: PhD positions Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning for Medical Imaging Apply Now Challenge Integrate AI into medical imaging practice. Change Knowledge-driven AI makes AI explainable and generalizable in practical scenarios. Impact Improve the generalizability and explainability of AI for clinical applications. Job description TU Delft is a top tier university and is exceedingly active in the field of Artificial intelligence. The “Knowledge-Driven AI Lab” (KDAI Lab) is devoted to the development and application of AI in applied sciences. We aim to strengthen today’s data-driven AI through integrating fundamental knowledge of imaging physics. AI techniques are transforming the entire chain of medical imaging, from physical acquisition and image analysis, to its diverse biomedical applications. The current success of AI can be largely attributed to the development of deep learning techniques that learn from large-scale data. The inherent dependency on the available training data, however, raises issues in theory and in practice, including among others, the limited generalizability when distribution shift occurs, and poor explainability when the set of parameters is large and unintuitive. This poses serious concerns when AI is to be applied to a clinical scenario where the stakes are high. KDAI has 2 PhD vacancies for AI research in medical imaging: (1) Research in AI methods integrating imaging physics. Your role is to develop AI methods that go beyond the data-driven principle and actively integrate the imaging physics of data (e.g. MRI, CT). The goal is to make the AI algorithms fundamentally robust and generalizable to data sources, including different manufacturers and medical centers. (2) Research on Explainable medical imaging AI. You role is to investigate explainable AI (XAI), in the scenario of medical imaging. This includes post-hoc understanding and visualization of complex deep neural networks for medical image analysis, and integration of explainability into the medical imaging AI algorithm design.  Requirements An MSc degree in (applied) physics, (applied) mathematics, computer science, electrical engineering, data science, artificial intelligence, or related fields. Interest in modern AI principles and applications. Proficiency in programming languages C/C++, Matlab, Python. Proficiency in written and verbal English. The ability to work in a team, take initiative, and be results-oriented. An affinity with teaching and guiding students. An affinity with medical imaging, image analysis, and clinical applications will be a plus. Conditions of employment TU Delft offers DAI-Lab PhD-candidates a 5-year contract (as opposed to the normal 4-years), with an official go/no go progress assessment after one year. Salary and benefits are in accordance with the Collective Labour Agreement for Dutch Universities, increasing from € 2395 per month in the first year to € 3217 in the fifth year. As a PhD candidate you will be enrolled in the TU Delft Graduate School. The TU Delft Graduate School provides an inspiring research environment with an excellent team of supervisors, academic staff and a mentor. The Doctoral Education Programme is aimed at developing your transferable, discipline-related and research skills. The TU Delft offers a customisable compensation package, discounts on health insurance and sport memberships, and a monthly work costs contribution. Flexible work schedules can be arranged. For international applicants we offer the Coming to Delft Service and Partner Career Advice to assist you with your relocation. TU Delft (Delft University of Technology) Delft University of Technology is built on strong foundations. As creators of the world-famous Dutch waterworks and pioneers in biotech, TU Delft is a top international university combining science, engineering and design. It delivers world class results in education, research and innovation to address challenges in the areas of energy, climate, mobility, health and digital society. For generations, our engineers have proven to be entrepreneurial problem-solvers, both in business and in a social context. At TU Delft we embrace diversity and aim to be as inclusive as possible (see our Code of Conduct). Together, we imagine, invent and create solutions using technology to have a positive impact on a global scale. Challenge. Change. Impact! Faculty Applied Sciences With more than 1,000 employees, including 135 pioneering principal investigators, as well as a population of about 3,400 passionate students, the Faculty of Applied Sciences is an inspiring scientific ecosystem. Focusing on key enabling technologies, such as quantum- and nanotechnology, photonics, biotechnology, synthetic biology and materials for energy storage and conversion, our faculty aims to provide solutions to important problems of the 21st century. To that end, we train students in broad Bachelor's and specialist Master's programmes with a strong research component. Our scientists conduct ground-breaking fundamental and applied research in the fields of Life and Health Science & Technology, Nanoscience, Chemical Engineering, Radiation Science & Technology, and Engineering Physics. We are also training the next generation of high school teachers and science communicators. Click here to go to the website of the Faculty of Applied Sciences. The Department of Imaging Physics (ImPhys) focuses on developing novel and revolutionary instruments and imaging technologies. Our research products extend existing boundaries in terms of spatial resolution, temporal resolution, and information/data throughput. We are pioneers in developing advanced concepts of computational imaging, a marriage between cleverly designed imaging systems and sophisticated AI analysis. KDAI Lab is a Delft Artificial Intelligence Lab. Artificial Intelligence, Data and Digitalisation are becoming increasingly important when looking for answers to major scientific and societal challenges. In a DAI-lab, experts in ‘the fundamentals of AI technology’ along with experts in ‘AI challenges’ run a shared lab. As a PhD, you will work with at least two academic members of staff and three other PhD candidates. In total TU Delft will establish 24 DAI-Labs, where 48 Tenure Trackers and 96 PhD candidates will have the opportunity to push the boundaries of science using AI. You will be a member of the thriving DAI-Lab community that fosters cross-fertilization between talents with different expertise and disciplines. Each team is driven by research questions which arise from scientific and societal challenges, and contribute to the development and execution of domain specific education. You will receive a 5-year contract and will be deployed for AI-related education for the usual teaching effort for PhD students in the faculty plus an additional 20%. The extra year compared to the usual 4-year contract accommodates the 20% additional AI, Data and Digitalisation education related activities. All team members have abundant opportunities for self-development. The KDAI Lab is directed by Dr. Qian Tao and Dr. Artur M. Schweidtmann. You will work in the Department of Imaging Physics, Faulty of Applied Science and be directly supervised by Dr. Qian Tao. You will work closely with clinical specialists in our collaboration network. You will also collaborate with two other PhDs of KDAI lab, who will be advised by Dr. Artur M. Schweidtmann. Additional information For information about this vacancy and the selection procedure, please contact Qian Tao, Assistant Professor, email: Q.Tao-1@tudelft.nl Application procedure Are you interested in this vacancy? Please apply before 5 april 2021 via the application button. Submit the following in two pdf files: (pdf 1) 1-page Motivation letter, your CV, undergraduate and graduate transcripts; (pdf 2) a (part of your) M.Sc. thesis or a paper that you have written, in which you demonstrate your writing skills. Please highlight in your motivation letter which Ph.D. position you are interested in and highlight examples of projects and achievements that demonstrate your relevant competences. A pre-employment screening can be part of the selection procedure. You can apply online. We will not process applications sent by email and/or post. Acquisition in response to this vacancy is not appreciated. FACULTY/DEPARTMENT Faculty of Applied Sciences JOB TYPE PhD SCIENTIFIC FIELD Natural sciences HOURS PER WEEK 32-38 SALARY € 2.395,00 - € 3.061,00 DESIRED LEVEL OF EDUCATION University graduate VACANCY NUMBER TUD00884 Apply Now

title: Data Analist
summary:
Ervaring op het gebied van data, zoals:
Je hebt minimaal 3 jaar relevante data ervaring opgedaan binnen je huidige of vorige functie.
description: Ben jij thuis in de wereld van data op het snijvlak van Business en IT? Wat ga je doen? Onze datapartner is dé thuisbasis voor Data Specialisten. Je gaat bij veelal corporatie organisaties aan innovatieve data gerelateerde opdrachten werken waarbij je vaak onderdeel uitmaakt van een projectgroep. De werkzaamheden liggen op het grensvlak van Business en IT. Afhankelijk van je (data) expertise ga jij aan de slag als bijvoorbeeld; BI Specialist, Data Scientist, Data Analist of Analytics Consultant. Naast de inzet van jouw consultancy vaardigheden maak jij ook gebruik van je proces (optimalisatie) kennis. Dit alles ondersteun jij door jouw kennis en inzet van visualisatie en ETL tooling, R, SQL, Power BI en dergelijke onmisbare technieken. Naast je werkzaamheden bij klanten ben je ook welkom op het eigen kantoor. Hier vinden kennissessies plaats met je collega’s en drinkt men een borrel. De organisatie wil een thuisbasis creëren zodat de onderlinge collegialiteit, verbinding en creativiteit blijft bruisen. Wat vragen wij? Een afgeronde IT gerelateerde HBO+ opleiding; Je hebt minimaal 3 jaar relevante data ervaring opgedaan binnen je huidige of vorige functie. BI Specialist, Informatie Analist, Data Steward, Data Scientist, Data Engineer, Business Analist of Software Engineer; Ervaring op het gebied van data, zoals: – Data modellering, governance, proces optimalisatie en het verkrijgen van uitvoerbare inzichten; – Visualisatie tooling zoals bijvoorbeeld Power BI, Tableau or Qlikview; – R, SQL, ETL tooling, Hadoop, Python en/of Spark Pragmatisme, enthousiasme, creativiteit en de lust om te 'gaan' voor concrete resultaten; De vaardigheid goede relaties op te bouwen en te onderhouden binnen klantenomgevingen. Wat kunnen wij bieden? De arbeidsvoorwaarden zijn flexibel en ondernemend. Je kunt kiezen voor een risiconiveau dat het beste bij je situatie past, maar om toch een indicatie te geven ligt het topsalaris (afhankelijk van ervaringen, opleiding e.d.) rond de 77.7K per jaar. Naast het salaris zijn er bonussen en beloningen te verdienen. Uiteraard bestaat er een prima regelingen voor een laptop, telefonie en mobiliteit. Qua type contract krijg je bij aanvang een jaarcontract aangeboden. Bij goed functioneren kan dit na 9 maanden omgezet worden naar een contract voor onbepaalde tijd. Verder krijg je 25 vakantiedagen die je mag uitbreiden door extra dagen te kopen. Een mooie pensioenregeling. Tevens is er per jaar voor iedereen een opleidingsbudget van ongeveer € 1.500,- beschikbaar. Wie is onze partner? Onze partner is een jong bedrijf met veel ervaring. Men bestaat nog niet lang maar de oprichters hebben samen bijna 100 jaar ervaring op het grensvlak van business en IT. Deze ervaring is opgedaan als ondernemer en binnen corporate IT organisaties. Onze partner is gelieerd aan een IT organisatie die bijna 10 jaar bestaat en hetzelfde concept hanteert. Een investeringsmaatschappij zorgt voor een solide financiële basis. Mensen komen bij onze partner optimaal tot hun recht. De focus ligt op de menselijke kant; je doet waar je goed in bent! Men gelooft dat jezelf en anderen ontwikkelen je een gelukkiger mens maakt en dat dit het best lukt in een veilige omgeving. De kracht van mensen is de basis van succes. Synergie komt als vanzelf. Gerco Hengstmengel Managing Consultant | op woensdag ben ik vrij info@recruitmentsolutions.nl 030 303 1277

title: Junior marketing analytics specialist
summary: Als marketing analytics specialist ben je onderdeel van het overkoepelend data team van Searchresult, bestaande uit data engineers, data scientists en data…
description: Dit ben jij Als junior marketing analytics specialist: Ben je enorm data driven; Je kunt niet wachten om aan de slag te gaan met de enorme stapel beschikbare data. Word je uitgedaagd door data vraagstukken en spar je hierover graag met collega`s en klanten. Heb je recent je studie marketing analytics afgerond en ben je op zoek naar je 1e of 2e stap in digital marketing. Dit ga je doen: Als marketing analytics specialist ben je onderdeel van het overkoepelend data team van Searchresult, bestaande uit data engineers, data scientists en data analisten. Je werkt aan projecten voor verschillende klanten en werkt samen met verschillende klantenteams.  Je bent zowel in- als extern aanspreekpunt voor vraagstukken die te maken hebben met meten en verbeteren van online prestaties.  Je zoekt naar inzichten in databronnen voor optimalisaties, legt verbanden tussen datasets en helpt bedrijven stap voor stap om meer data-driven te worden. Dat betekent dat je website en web statistieken analyses verzorgt, evaluaties uitwerkt en deze vervolgens bespreekt met je klanten.  Binnen Searchresult vinden we het belangrijk dat jij je binnen je vakgebied ontwikkelt. Je beheert zelfstandig accounts maar werkt ook mee aan implementaties en metingen van grotere accounts. Daarnaast neem je deel aan kennissessies & trainingen van je eigen kanaal en-/of andere disciplines.  Ons data team groeit. En dat is niet voor niks! Naast Google Cloud certified partner zijn we sinds september ook Looker partner. Dit maakt Adeptiv een van de weinige partijen in Nederland die alle Google disciplines in huis heeft. Groei jij met ons mee?!  Concreet houd jij je bezig met: Het uitvoeren van periodieke en ad hoc analyses in big data of website- en web statistieken Het vertalen van grote hoeveelheden data naar actie gerichte inzichten Het ondersteunen van klanten bij het stellen van relevante KPI`s en targets als basis voor groei. Het opzetten en onderhouden van dashboards om de data op een voor de klant aantrekkelijke manier te visualiseren; Het implementeren en beheren van geadviseerde metingen, datastromen & optimalisaties met behulp van Javascript, SQL, Python of andere programmeertalen; Het bedenken en optimaliseren van datastromen met behulp van cloud infrastructuren; Het begeleiden van implementaties van analysetools, zelfstandig of met een collega;   Dit levert het je op:  Een dienstverband van 32 tot 40 uur in de week en maar liefst 28 vakantiedagen per jaar. Een laptop, telefoon & deelname aan onze pensioenregeling. Een maandelijkse thuiswerkvergoeding, zolang (gedeeltelijk) thuiswerken aan de orde is. Een uitdagende functie in een omgeving waar eigen initiatief en nieuwe ideeën toegejuicht worden. Een werkplek waar veelvuldig van en met elkaar geleerd wordt, bijvoorbeeld in onze eigen Academy. Een ambitieus team binnen een informele organisatie. Legendarische uitjes en feestjes, Brabantse gezelligheid op de vrijdagmiddag borrel en deelname aan ons Vitaliteitsprogramma. Vereisten Dit breng je mee: Een Master in de richting van Marketing Analytics Enige ervaring binnen digital marketing, bijvoorbeeld tijdens een bijbaan of (meewerk)stage, is een grote pre. Enige kennis van Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager en online marketingkanalen. Kennis van Google cloud is een pre. Enige kennis van / affiniteit met HTML, CSS, Javascript en/of Python. Analytisch vermogen en sterke communicatieve vaardigheden. Je bent klantgericht, nauwkeurig, proactief en zelfstandig.   Dit zijn wij: “We make brands grow”. Searchresult zorgt voor groei voor haar klanten door digitale aanwezigheid, conversie naar sales en het anticiperen op switchgedrag. Het laten groeien van merken en oogsten door performance, dát is wat wij doen. Meten is weten. Searchresult streeft naar transparantie in een niet-transparante omgeving. Daarom staat meetbaarheid voor onze opdrachtgevers in elke fase voorop. Ondanks dat data, technologie en innovatie cruciaal zijn, zullen wij nooit de sleutel tot ons succes vergeten. Onze medewerkers. Searchresult is technology based, human driven! Samen met Searchresult en Kernel is Yourzine onderdeel van Adeptiv  Meer weten? Neem contact op met Manon Berben, Recruiter. m.berben@adeptiv.nl / 0652819384
